If you want to stop reading here, just know that this TV has exceeded my expectations on all levels and is by far still a great TV even 2 years after having it.I have my xbox 360, my playstation 3, and cable hooked up through hdmi, my wii hooked up through component, my computer hooked up through VGA, and an old nintendo 64 hooked up through composite. All of these work without a hitch, delivering great quality in colors and image quality.I love this set for the amount of inputs it has, and the high amount of access the consumer gets to alter the image. It has plenty of settings for calibration enthusiasts to mess with so that you can get the best picture you can get. There is a very slight amount of light bleeding in the corners, but you can only see it on a completely black screen, and for that matter, the room has to be pretty dark too, but honestly, this is a miniscule problem that is corrected way better than I've seen before on other brand sets.The remote is easy enough to use, though I can't say that I used it much since I upgraded to a Harmony One soon after I got my TV.One thing that I didn't like about the set was how much dust shows up on the set. While you don't notice it so much on the screen itself, you notice it easily everywhere else. I tend to clean it up about once a week to keep it looking good.After 2 years, It's never broken down on me, and I expect it to continue working for a long while.  If you happen to find one of these for a good price, pick it up. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: The auto shut-off issue is real and I lived through it
Reviews.Author: M. Laird "amazombie"
Reviews.Content: As an owner of a Samsung 52750 I am quite torn. We love the tv and we choose it because of the quality of the image and features (the sound quality, sizes, and the swivel base are really nice), and ultimately for the price point. But we did live through the hell that is the 'auto shut-off' issue you will find mentioned by several reviewers here and on other sites.. and it is real. And like others have said, it started for us by just turning off once every few days and coming back up, then it got more frequent over a couple months, to a point where it wouldn't come up all the way again at all.. it would just cycle through restarting over, and over and over. Samsung support was good in expediting the fix to a local repair rep, but then we got put in a queue of about a week or more for them to get out and repair it. What's worse is it took them 5 (!) trips to our house to finally replace the right part that fully corrected it. So that means we lived without a normal functioning tv for nearly 2 months, said and done. Fortunately, we've been pretty much issue-free for about 10 months now, but it has shut off a couple times and has not seemed to continued. But we do live on the edge of our seats with this and the warranty is up, so knock on wood, we hope it's behind us. And although really do love the tv, I can't say I'd recommend taking the risk. We also know 3 friends of friends that had the same issue, so it is very real.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Timothy L. Shelton
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for over 2 years and it's still amazing!!! value, value, value. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat when I need a new TV for game room, keeping room, etc.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded Our Expectations
Reviews.Author: Retired "Sunfan"
Reviews.Content: A great TV for a really reasonable price. We couldn't be happier with the picture quality, ease of use, and simple set-up. This is a bedroom TV that sits perpendicular to a large, 3-paned glass slide and opposite two very large windows and yet the picture has no glare in full Florida sun. Our only complaint is that the TV's speakers produce very poor sound quality. We remedied that problem by hooking the TV to a small Onkyo receiver with Bose speakers and the sound is now terrific. We waited 7 months to write a review to see what problems might develop and there have been absolutely none. A great set for the money with an outstanding picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the best!
Reviews.Author: Mason Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this to put in our bedroom and we find our self's watching TV more in there than the living room! I've always had Sony's, but now I'm definitely going for Samsung. Great LCD television all around!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung and Amazon two great companys
Reviews.Author: D. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing my product i had not dealt with either company before.I was slightly appresensive about dealing with companies I was not familiar with.However after decidingto make my purchase I decided to give them a try.I have no regrets about making that decision.Amazon aided my decision by provideing me with extensive information about my product.The price they offered was perfect for me because I am on a fixed income.I heard of Samsung but had never owned one of their products.The first Samsung we purchased was for our living room a 52inch flat screen LCD HD TV.I was very pleased with the quality of every acpect with the exception of the sound.We added extra speakers and the sound is surperb.The features of the TV work perfect for us.I was so pleased we purchased a second Sumsung 40inch LCD HD TV for the bed room with the same features as the first one.I would highly recommend both companies to anyone who is interested  inculding my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Zhigang Li
Reviews.Content: We got this TV for 6+ months and everything is good and meets our expectation. Relatively speaking TV speakers might be the weakest link, but we hook it up with external speakers so that's not a problem for us.

Reviews.Title: Best 60Hz 1080p HDTV Under $1000!
Reviews.Author: Princess
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research looking for our perfect High Definition television for about a year before finally making our purchase. Because we have only one television in our house we wanted to be certain of our choice. Sure, you can spend more money for the same size television with similar specs, but why would you?The Samsung LN40A550 has a stellar full hi-def 1080p picture for a 40" HDTV running at only 60Hz.  After seeking out an HDTV for many moons that would satisfy our viewing needs we had basically settled on one of three options: a Sony Bravia, a Sharp Aquos or the Samsung television which we now own and couldn't be happier with.  The resolution is superb, the colors are rich and performance is rock solid.From the opening chime you'll be delighted until you turn it off and the set chimes a second time (there is the option to turn this off if it annoys you).  There are three HDMI inputs and a PC input (handily located on the side for quick laptop connectivity); we currently only utilize two HDMI ports, one for an Xbox 360 which doubles as our upconverting DVD player and one for our HD DVR/Receiver.The set up is a snap, and if you're familiar with menu schemes, you'll quickly find yourself navigating with ease.  We picked this set up on sale for under $800 after waiting a long time for prices to come down and I see no viable competition for it in the $1100 and under range.  If you require more HDMI inputs or demand a 120 Hz picture, then I can't quite recommend this for you, but if you have typical family needs and want a rock-solid beautiful television for under $1000 you can do no better.  Buy it.  You'll be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV..VERY SHARP..MANY HOOKUPS!!
Reviews.Author: Jessie S. Murray
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing!!! I bought this at BestBuy in Fall '08 for the Black Friday Thanksgiving thingy for only $605!!!! Best 600 i ever spent...i am currently using this as my PC screeen & Theatre TV In my Living Room!!! Got the HD TV from the Local Cable TV provider and everything looks Beautiful....for the class it's in I think it is probably the best looking quality!!! Easy OnScreen Software to use!!!Only Downfalls i have with this is - Hookups could use 1 more HDMI and/or DVI!!!ONLY the RF Cable input can be used for PIP Function!!!!I own a Samsung BDP-1500 BluRay Player so the ANYNET+ feature is sweet...put in a disk and it turns on the TV and the Theatre System all in one (EVERYTHING MUST BE SAMSUNG PRODUCT & COMPATIBLE WITH ANYNET FEATURE)Owned many samsung products....this one THE BEST!!Can't wait for the Samsung 120hz or 240hz to be in my living room next!!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: Paul T. Coynes
Reviews.Content: Have had it for 6 months, everything is perfect.  Easily the best $[...] I've ever spent.  Believed it to be the best value in an HDTV back when I was doing my research before I bought it, now I'm SURE of it.  Get off the fence if you're on it and buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Sumin Song
Reviews.Content: We got this TV about 6 months ago and have been enjoying it ever since then. It's a wonderful product and my wife and I both like it very much. Now we are considering getting an even bigger one in the coming holiday season. Five stars in my eyes, no doubt.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40in 1080p LCD
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: The seller shipped this item quickly.  When I set it up in my bedroom I was amazed by the picture.  The  P-I-P worked, wished there was a way to get sound or switch between main image and P-I-P.  I'd suggested setting up with external speakers if in a living room.  Over all I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Madhu
Reviews.Content: I am very glad i purchased this TV. It been over 6 months and no problems so far. Picture is great. I love it!Update:Its been more than a year and TV is still amazing.

Reviews.Title: NICE TV BUT CRAPPY INTERNALSPEAKERS
Reviews.Author: K. Snide
Reviews.Content: I ONLY GAVE THIS A 4 STAR BECAUSE OF THE INTERNAL SPEAKERS. THE ARE NOT CRISP AND DEEP SOUNDING. THEY SOUND KIND OF DULL DURING SOUND EFFECTS ON MOVIES AND VIDEO GAMES. I USE MY HOME THEATER SYSTEM MORE THAN I THOUGHT.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550
Reviews.Author: DD70000
Reviews.Content: Overall, I am happy with the product.  I don't use this as my main TV so I don't have HD programming on it.  Still, the picture is quite good.  The exterior of the set is well designed.  My only complaint is a thin white light below the screen that goes on when the set is turned on (it makes an annoying chime too).  There is not need for the light or the chime so I don't understand why the manufacture decided to add it.  However, this is very minor and should not deter anyone from buying the set.  In sum, I find the TV to be an excellent one for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good for us
Reviews.Author: mr "Houston"
Reviews.Content: Not a great review but for somebody who can't understand all the terms of latest TV technology but just have to upgrade to a flat screen.Checked out a similar configuration TV from Sony but it was way too expensive.I am reviewing this after 6 months of purchase.I have been busy admiring the flat screen. Coming to TV, it is excellent for us.It has 3 HDMI outputs and Oh yes, you can connect your 1st gen Xbox to this.No extra cables needed.Just connect the Xbox and TV with existing cables.But for connecting anything else, you need to order HDMI cables.Order them from amazon as they are very expensive in the stores. No problems reported so far. Sound can be a bit better. The remote is bit big for my hands but I guess I can live with it.The picture quality is good.It doesn't have the 120hz feature but unless you watch sports everyday hour of the day, I don't think that matters.Even with ports, there is a sports mode which can used but in normal mode, you can notice the pixels since it lacks the 120 hz feature.The menu can be a bit tiresome.I can't remember which function is in which part of the menu.I have to keep checking each and every option till I find the required setting.ON the whole, its good TV for the price for anyone who doesn't spend a lot of time infront of it.The shipping from CEVA was good.White glove service.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but it makes noise.
Reviews.Author: R. Neil
Reviews.Content: We've had the TV for several months now and it is wonderful. Very clear pictures, especially in HD. The only minor complaint is that there is a relatively long delay between pushing the power "on" button and the TV actually turning on (1-2 seconds), and when it does, it has a loud chime. This wouldn't be annoying except that we have an infant in the house who is often sleeping in the same room as the TV, and the chime is loud enough to disturb her from sleep. It also chimes when you turn it off, though if you mute the TV, the chime is muted as well. Wish that was an option when you turned it on. Otherwise, fantastic TV, great price, clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: C. N. Sargent
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this to anyone. It has a great quality picture. Well worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Great TV... but do not order from ""ELECTRONICS EXPO" from NJ
Reviews.Author: NYCFTA "USAE5"
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. But watch who you are ordering from. I have a problem with the TV that came damage during shipment. I have called several time to resolve the issue with exchanging it. They told me to contact the "Manufacturer" to fix the problem. So, I called Samsung and they had a tech to see the problem. When the tech saw the TV, he told me that Samsung with not replace the LCD screen. He told me, it would "COST" me $900 to replace it. I call the Electronics Expo again, and now they tell me that they have to contact the shipper. I waited and waited with no responds. I was so angry, I disputed with my credit card and gave them a bad feedback. I also had a similar problem with VANN'S but there are GREAT. I love them. Watch out for "ELECTRONICS EXPO".

Reviews.Title: I can get some Satisfaction
Reviews.Author: D. Dunlap "Loving HD TV"
Reviews.Content: I've been looking at HD TV's for  a year.  I was weary of discussing pros and cons with sales people who seemed weary of their jobs and provided little info.  Luckily, my daughter's significant other took the time to sit with me and go over the pros and cons of various TVs and which bells and whistles did I need and which were overkill.  Then he told me what a great experience he had buying from Amazon.  So I tried it and I was thoroughly impressed. My 40" Samsung Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTVis terrific, delivery was quick and efficient, and there was no shipping charge!  Now, if we could just get our government to run as effeciently as Amazon...

Reviews.Title: Totally satisfied: great T-V, great price, great service
Reviews.Author: Keith E. Barber
Reviews.Content: After months of indecision, Amazon's great price and free shipping got me off the dime on this and I'm so glad. I have HDTV service from my Time-Warner and made connection with HDMI, and am absolutely delighted with the picture. The sound is very good from the t-v, much better than average, and more than  adequate for news, talk, etc., but for other content I crank up my home theatre.Performance out of the box was very good. As I tweak a little here and there, we've moved up to excellent. Absolutely spectacular picture on HD source, and much better on SD than I had expected.Amazon's free shipping provided a lot more service than I had anticipated. I expected the box to be dropped in my co-op's receiving room and that I'd have to do the rest. Instead, these guys made a delivery appointment, brought it up to my apartment, unpacked it, and got it going. They were polite and efficient. A lot more than I expected for free shipping. A major bricks-and-mortar retail chain wanted $300 more for the same t-v and $100 more to deliver it. Way to go Amazon.This is my first big-ticket purchase from Amazon and I can assure you they have won me over. Amazon is not just for buying books any more.

Reviews.Title: Very nice HDTV for a great price!
Reviews.Author: A. Marshall "Aaronseye.com"
Reviews.Content: I researched all over and was set on a 40" v- series Sony.  Went to a store to see it in person and this Samsung 40" 550 was $400 cheaper and stole the show.  Then looked online and found a great deal here.  My only gripe was the shipping took about a week longer than promised.  But this deal and TV is worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price - Good TV
Reviews.Author: Z. Cottingham "Zac"
Reviews.Content: I ordered on a Friday morning, recieved the TV via Pilot Air frieght on the following Tuesday.  Delivery was no-hassle and on time.  TV looks good out of box after i did some tweaking (thanks AVS Forums!).  I got this deal when Amazon briefly lowered the price so it was a hell of a deal.I did a lot of research before buying a TV, and this one had great reviews on Cnet and various other sites.  One thing i found out later was that Samsung sends these reviewers panels that are made in the Samsung factory called "S" panels.  These are usually far superior to the panels that Samsung outsources to third parties, "C" and "A" panels.  Sadly I got a "C" panel, and it definaltey doesnt have the clarity of the "S" panel on display at Costco.  While I got a great deal on this TV, and the picture is still good and I'm happy with the purchase, I'll probably not buy another Samsung TV because of this issue.  Its basically a crapshoot on what kind of panel you'll get, and no way to tell until you take the TV out of the box.If you're on the fence about the LN40a550 vs. TV X i would go to Youtube and search "S" panel vs "C" panel and look at the demo that was created and you get the idea.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Low Budget LCD
Reviews.Author: C. Lane
Reviews.Content: Been looking for a LCD 40-46" for almost a year...waiting for a great deal on a LNXXA650 or higher model.  Came across this LN40A550 when comparing screens and options at a local retailer and decided that I would be willing to save some $$ to replace our old standard TV.Delivery was great.  They helped unbox and gave a few pointers as well.  Waited a few hours and powered it up.  What a great picture!!  The size was perfect for our room.  Just simple plug and play setup.  Definitely would recommend this to others looking for a low cost LCD with lots of features.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNA40550
Reviews.Author: RAC "informed buyer"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, Lots of features.  Great television!  Great service from vendor.  Product was in my home a week after ordering.  White glove delivery - television was brought into my home and he helped me get it into place.  He waited to make sure it was working correctly before leaving.  Would definitely purchase from this vendor again!

Reviews.Title: I am loving it!
Reviews.Author: Anuj Saxena
Reviews.Content: Graduated from a Sony Wega 24" to this TV, so obviously am mighty impressed. The picture quality is amazing on HD TV channels and watching movies is a pleasure on this TV. The TV itself looks great even when off, is light weight and the swivel feature is nice. Love the support for almost all type of inputs - HDMI, Co-axial, VGA, Optical, S-Video  etc etc. What could have been better is the overall sound quality and close captioning support through HDMI (not sure if this is a TV constraint or HDMI constraint).Amazon's shipping (outsourced to third party I guess) was amazing. They called to confirm delivery time and were punctual, neat and set up my TV in a matter of minutes.Overall - great value for price I paid!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Page Gentleman
Reviews.Content: Sports have NEVER looked so good, even live! The Samsung is living up to the excellent reviews with these exceptions: the sound is not good, so I purchased a pair of speakers which make a huge difference. Also, if you're not looking at the picture from right in front, the color looks washed out, but I understand that goes with lcd (vs plasma). I originally looked at 32" and 37", coming from an old-fashioned 27" analog model, but I'm glad I stepped up to the 40"--the perfect size for the room and the distance to the sitting area.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, But...
Reviews.Author: B. Rose
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LN40A550 through Amazon.  Shipping and delivery was very smooth and without incident.I am very pleased with the HD picture through a HDMI connection to my cable box and also the component connection to my dvd player.  I have watched a bunch of hockey games in HD and the picture holds up well with the fast pace of the game.  I especially like the pre-programmed picture settings for sports, movies, etc.  The settings seem to be endless.  You could customize the picture any way you want.  The remote is backlit, great for low light operation.I have not experienced any HDMI issues that other reviews have indicated.Many reviews have given the sound quality a poor rating.  I agree the audio could be a lot better, but using my audio system most of time the TV audio does not affect me.When changing channels that have different resolutions (ie. 720p to 1080i) the screen goes black for a few seconds.One problem that has bothered me since I hooked up the TV is the white light "leak" at the corners, which is only visible on dark scenes or when I use 4:3 to watch standard def programs.  For a company that has been making LCD's for a long time I wouldn't expect this type of problem.  My 26" Maxent LCD that I have had for over 3 years never had this type of problem.  I have contacted Samsung and will post their reply when I receive it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - Nice looking TV!
Reviews.Author: MondaysChild
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv and Amazon's shippers CEVA set it up on April 10, 2009.  The shipping company was 2 hours late but that's for another review!This tv looks really nice!  I recalibrated the settings according to AVS Forum so I could compare, but I have to say the factory settings are very nice too.  They are just a little bright.  The tv hooked up in seconds.  We do not have HD in the house yet and the standard coaxial cable still looks very nice.  DVDs look outstanding.Previous reviews state the sound it bad, and it is...really bad.  It is hollow sounding.  I hooked up to the surround system so no worries.  I think we got a great deal for less than $800!  I look forward to using this tv for many years!

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: Tessie "Tessie"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN40A550 40" is great.  The picture is incredibly sharp and the colors are perfect.  Also, the experience of ordering through Amazon (free shipping-hooray)and delivery via Pilot was perfect.  Pilot calls ahead to arrange a convenient date for delivery and 2 very nice guys brought it in the house, opened the box and waited for us to inspect before leaving.  I highly recommend this tv and ordering through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!!
Reviews.Author: Kim209
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN40A550 is an excellent television. After doing a lot of research I decided to purchase this TV and it is exactly what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550
Reviews.Author: SP in Montana
Reviews.Content: I just got this and love it. Getting it here was a mess as I live in Montana, it took 15 days and I had to travel 120 miles to pick it up. If I didnt make the trip it was going to take an additional 7 days to get it delivered.This is my first HDTV, I only have std cable and I'm very impressed with the qualilty of the picture. I cant wait to see what it will do with upconverting or Blue-Ray.I have read several reviews that said the sound is sub par. I have found that if you do some adjusting its just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture but not so good Sound
Reviews.Author: Viju James
Reviews.Content: I have been using the TV for just 2 days. Here is my first impression.Picture - Excellent for HD content like over the Air HD channels. It is also excellent when connected to my 1080P up-converting Panasonic DVD player using HDMI. Not so good for standard definition TV channels that transmit 480i.Audio - Good for over the air channels. Poor when DVD player is connected (I haven't tried to adjust the bass/treble though. I will have to find out if there is a way to adjust those)Physical Appearance - Not very impressed. Just plain styling. Wide frame.Remote Control - Very good. Easy to operate.Shipping from Amazon - Excellent. Got 3 days earlier. Got in 5 days with Free standard shipping.Misc - Haven't got a chance to connect PC and use USB port.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Shane G. Engelman "Haroboy876"
Reviews.Content: First off, I have to congratulate Amazon on their prompt and superb (I repeat-SUPERB) service. TV came earlier than the earliest projected delivery date, and the delivery man helped me up to the third floor and offered to set it up. He even refused the tip!TV was perfect. No dead pixels/screen cracks/anything. The clarity is incredible. The size is also larger than I anticipated. I'm actually on my PC (which I now have multiple monitors on, thanks to a DVI to HDMI converter [also bought on Amazon]) writing this review. The setup was painless and it automatically detected all available channels. The speakers aren't that bad unless you're audio-obsessed. I'm going to hook the TV up to my surround sound when those cables come in the mail.I have a Wii and PS3 hooked up to it. Both look absolutely outstanding via the HDMI cable for the PS3 and component cables for the Wii (yet again, also ordered on Amazon).The blacks are deep and the color is acute on every source I've tried. The panel is clear and the frame is not distracting like some of the Touch of Colors can be. The remote is responsive and feels well-constructed (comes with batteries included). Personally, I don't like 120 hz because it kind of just hurts my brain to look at it, so I saved money and am happy with the results.This is a great buy... so buy it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV is tops
Reviews.Author: Ted M. Richert
Reviews.Content: I could not be more pleased with my new Samsung 40-inch LCD HDTV.  I had no trouble setting it up, and it was beautiful from the very first moment I turned it on.  Then a week later I had AT&T;'s U-verse fibre-optic service installed replacing my cable service.  The picture is even more incredible than I ever thought it could be.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: D. Cone "baseball fan"
Reviews.Content: The picture is excellent.  The sound needed some adjusting to sound decent.  If you plan on connecting your own speakers you should be fine.  Overall an excellent value for the price.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Stonycreek
Reviews.Content: This tv is as good as i expected.  Picture quality is great.  Some said that the sound was bad, but i have no problems with the sound quality.  It looks great and works well in a smaller living room.

Reviews.Title: awesome picture
Reviews.Author: M. Beason
Reviews.Content: Arrived 3 days earlier than estimate. Delivery guy offered to help me set it up, but I just took it out of the box (which had no apparent damage) and made sure there was no damage to the set inside.  Beautiful picture. Not enough superlatives to describe it.  Watched the Masters golf on it and was just blown away.  Had it hooked up to my surround system and running through its set-up in about 10 minutes.  All I had to do was plug it in and plug in the hdmi cable from my satellite receiver.  Cabinet looks great.  Some people have too much money to play with.  Why would you pay a couple of hundred more to change the piano black to Red Touch of Color?  Played with some of the settings so that it looked good to me. If I couldn't make it look better left the factory settings.  Will be tweaking them further later.  Like the swivel base as I have bought a corner entertainment center for it to sit on instead of wall mounting it. I paid 799.98 which was one cent cheaper than Best Buy but I would have had to make 120 mile round trip to pick it up.  Amazon....free shipping.....no brainer.  BUY IT, but get the price at what you want to pay for it.  I watched the price go up and down for two weeks before it finally dropped to what I clicked on. Went from 799.99 all the way up to 925.00.  Newer model already out. It's more expensive and has more bells and whistles. I liked this models oval base better than the newer ones square (rectangular) one.  Not sure the new base swivels.  Doesn't matter if you are going to hang it on a wall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. L. McKeever
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great value for the money.  The menu system is easy to use.  The colors are vivid.  It has a nice variety of useful options.

Reviews.Title: this recent purchase worth every penny
Reviews.Author: violinmike
Reviews.Content: yes, this is one of the best purchases I made this year. The price for the size and quality can't be beat anywhere. It's perfect for someone like me who watches a lot of sports. My wife is saying I'm not doing anything but watching this tv. How can I help it? I'd give this product 10 stars if I could.

Reviews.Title: Done with Sony
Reviews.Author: Gerald D. Kuhn "Retired Prof"
Reviews.Content: Two cameras, two computers and 50" TV manufactured by Sony in the last 3 years all had serious defects.  Sony did repair free.  This Samsung TV is fabulous.  Easy to setup and use.. plus it was less costly than Sony TV of similar specs.  We are totally pleased with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" LCD, Model LN40A550
Reviews.Author: Kenneth R. Busch
Reviews.Content: The product is great and your delivery service was great.  I have had the set for about a month and I can't be more pleased.  Now my wife wants another one but she will have to wait.

Reviews.Title: Best for the buck
Reviews.Author: E. Franz
Reviews.Content: There's a lot of talk about 120 herz, etc.  At 40" you're not going to notice any difference between this and newer models except the $500 you didn't spend.  With a 1080P uploading DVD player or Blu-Ray, your picture will be better than most movie theaters.It's got plenty of ports, and you can play with the picture settings, should you desire.On an HD satellite or cable box, you will notice "paisley" blacks on the non-HD channels, something not as noticeable if you are just using a regular box.At $900, it's the best deal on TVs in the Spring of '09.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT purchase
Reviews.Author: Spaceman
Reviews.Content: Considering it was already on sale, no shipping and handling, AND no taxes, you really can't beat buying this TV on Amazon.The TV itself is incredible.  Beautiful picture.  Perfect for watching DVD's and playing video games.If you're in the market for a solid '40 inch HDTV, look no further.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: S. Shaw
Reviews.Content: This tv is really worth the money and has great definition. If you are debating on which tv to buy this one will not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV!! Great Service from Amazon and Pilot Delivery
Reviews.Author: Cece
Reviews.Content: I ordered the TV on a Friday and received it the following Tuesday. The delivery company is great...Ken patiently waited while I was delayed in getting home by a slow train. He was not in a hurry to leave and made sure I had no questions or concerns before he left.This is my first large order from Amazon. The 40" fit perfectly in my 41" width cabinet.I have cable and the coaxial cable hook up is satisfactory, but I think I'm going to get the HD box in order to get the best picture. However, the current picture is amazing. The sound/audio is very good, no complaints.I strongly recommend ordering this TV from Amazon, even if you live in a tiny town far from a big city. I was most concerned about delivery and set up, there was no need for concern,it was perfect!Thank you for making this so easy.3/31/09: Added HD box and the picture and sound improved dramatically, it's amazing. WOW!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550
Reviews.Author: Raymond C. Fields
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV easy setup and a wounderful picture,Shiping Co.unpacked it and pluged it in to make sure everything was OK.Service from Amazon.com was great.  Ray

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: Larry J Burge
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung TV after reading the very good reviews in Consumer Reports.  It was rated near the top, and especially in the price range.  I received the tv in about 5 days from order, and was amazed at how well it was packed.  Within 15 mins. I had the system up and running, and I'm actually very technically challenged.  The picture and sound are outstanding -- I'm on a Time Warner HD System.  I would recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: It's Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Steve Foster
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this TV! It has more features than I need and the picture is amazing. I have had absolutely no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: T. Chumley
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV on Sunday evening and received it Wednesday afternoon!!!  Delivery was by Pilot and the package arrived in perfect condition!  All this with Free shipping!  Setup was pretty much effortless and I was up and watching HD in under 10 minutes!  Overall I am Very impressed!  Sound is nowhere close to as bad as I expected after reading some of the reviews and is more than adequate for everyday viewing.  I use my HT Receiver and speakers for movies anyway, so that is taken care of!  Picture quality is excellent right out of the box and I think it can be better once I get some time to play with settings.  Today I hooked up my Samsung BD-P2550 Blu-Ray player and watched I Am Legend in Blu-Ray and all I can say is WOW!!!  Load time wasn't at all long and the picture and sound quality were definitely as advertised!!  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that while the sound is way better than I expected, I do think it could be better.  All in all, at this price, I don't think you can do better!

Reviews.Title: Best Value Out There
Reviews.Author: Griffin Coles "GC23"
Reviews.Content: I shopped around for the best value out right now.  I went to local electronic stores and they all said the same thing...if you can find the Samsung LN40A550 1080p for under $1000...BUY IT!.  Every store in all of Rochester, NY was out of stock for this TV and the Samsung warehouses were out.  I checked Amazon.com and found the TV for $849.99.  The picture of the TV is unbelievable with its blacks.  The only negative about the TV would be its audio.  I previously had a SONY which had much better sound quality.  For the price and the picture I get I am completely satisfied.  I would recommend it to anyone looking to buy a LCD 1080p for under $1000.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris Hopkins "newcastle68"
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to stretch my budget up to the LN40A630 but this just isn't that kind of economy.  I love the picture and the features and it looks great with my Samsung Blu-ray player.  The only  thing that I don't care for is the piano black finish which has the scratchability factor of the back of your average ipod (i.e. don't even glance at it).  That being said, almost all good LCDs seem to have this finish lately.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV delivers quality for $300 less than Sony
Reviews.Author: Old Mainer "Maineiac Granddad"
Reviews.Content: My last several TV's have been Sonys.  I liked the picture and they seem to be well made and long lasting.  Several people whose judgment I trust told me that the Samsung TV's offer similar quality for less money.  Based on using this TV for about a month, I'd say they were right.I particularly like the simple, clearly marked remote.  Best I've seen for a TV.  It's even backlit with descriptions on the buttons.Suggestion -- It would be helpful if the manual were to suggest alternative sets of color parameters.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase!!
Reviews.Author: Arch3rd "Arch3rd"
Reviews.Content: After going to just about every electronic store in my area I was getting discouraged about finding a good TV for a good deal. I then checked out consumer reports to find the Samsung 40" to be the top of the line. I then turned to amazon and found great deal! Free Shipping that included set up by the carrier was just awesome! Picture is awesome with HD programming. Great Buy! Get One and buy it from amazon!

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: Zachery Deback
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv but I am very upset that I purchased the tv 2 weeks ago at 899 and it is now 799:( Amazon no longer price protects for 30 days.

Reviews.Title: best of the best
Reviews.Author: george e gregory
Reviews.Content: After reading a lot of reviews on tv's I went with the samsung ln40A550.After receiving the set I know it was the correct choice.

Reviews.Title: great tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: Antony
Reviews.Content: I ordered ln40a550 on march 11 and on 12th morning, i received call from ceva/eagle for delivery. They had the tv setup and made sure everything was good before they left.TV has a great picture and i believe the sound quality is not that great , but not bad at all. Its really good.

Reviews.Title: Two Thumbs Up!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey S Milligan "Jeff Milligan"
Reviews.Content: Two thumbs up on this one. I liked the first one so well I bought a second one. Only the true videophiles would find fault with this TV.

Reviews.Title: I'm just as happy as if I were in my right mind!
Reviews.Author: Russ Werth "Frosted the No Man"
Reviews.Content: This puppy is everything they said it would be EXCEPT  I can't figure out how to make the Picture in a Picture work.  Please help this HDTV (Happy Dummy Today Vit (your help)!  It really is the best TV for the price!!

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: P. Loubier "KNIVES INC."
Reviews.Content: Very happy with set arrived on time & set up by driver.colors are great ,sound good,everything I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: M. Gaines
Reviews.Content: Vibrant beautiful colors is the first thing that comes in mind when i think of this tv.  The picture is amazing.  Not to fond of the on-screen menus cause they're not as user friendly as i'd like.  The only thing i regret is that i didn't get a bigger size!

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE!!!
Reviews.Author: Open Ears
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with this wonderful TV. It is much nicer than I expected, especially for the price paid. I agree with other reviewers that the sound quality is lacking, but I had planned anyway to include an amplifier and auxillary speakers to enhance it. Even with fair speakers, it is WAY better than the 20 year old mono TV it replaced. The delivery suppled by Amazon through Pilot was perfect. The carriers arrived exactly on time, set up the TV with care and were polite and courteous. This beats the heck out of shopping in a store and bringing the TV home myself and setting it up. Effortless experience!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture for a Great Price and Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Loren Strelow
Reviews.Content: Great Picture for a Great Price and Easy to Use.  The sound quanlity is ok, but is not an issue with surround sound.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV but with some limitations
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Danberg
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money.  However, to my surprise, there is some intermittent pixilation with certain HD images.  Also, as is stated in other reviews, the sound quality is marginal.  On the positive, the TV was very easy to set up, and the standard definition picture (i.e., non-HD) is better than other reviewers would suggest.

Reviews.Title: Seller Was a Crook!
Reviews.Author: D. Depew
Reviews.Content: I'm afraid I can't rate the product, because I never received it as promised.  However, Amazon did make good on the purchase and refunded  my money, after almost a months time from when I placed the order.

Reviews.Title: Very very satisfied
Reviews.Author: M. Regan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set about two weeks ago and couldn't be happier with it.  Amazon's price ($899) was better than any other I could find for this set and being tax free with white glove delivery included, it was a good buy.  The delivery company came within 5 days of my online order and unpacked the set and tested it.  The whole process took less than 15 minutes.Great picture. (For those who are concerned about the screen code on the back, this one has an "S")  The set up was easy. The sound is acceptable and compares favorably with other brands.  Obviously it is not like having a home theatre system but is adequate.Since I have a Dish Network HD package, the 1080p set provides a much better HD picture than the 720p.  Probably not as important on the smaller screens, but on a 40" or larger set it makes a difference.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased - great price - great picture - one flaw so far
Reviews.Author: javajunki
Reviews.Content: I've only had this for about a week but so far so good. Impressive price, impressive picture. VERY easy and intuitive design especially related to the online menu. Remote control is a bit large but easy to use with accessible keys and backlighting that is convenient. Television has a nice selection of pre-sets that are simple and relevant including color and audio. The ability to switch between different sources (air, cable etc) is very nice especially since we use both cable and a air for dtv. Stand is removable for easy wall installation and set fit a universal wall bracket perfectly (saved a bundle).Delivery took a bit longer than anticipated but went smoothly enough - no complaints. Brought into house and unpacked. Turned on then signed papers. Delivery driver even mentioned a quick tip to "keep the box" just in case it had to go back for any reason as they charge $25 for a replacement box.The only "negative" experienced so far is when trying to use a dvd player from EU - pictures shows only in b&w.; I understand there is supposedly some sort of work around but haven't had it long enough to find it yet. Fortunately, we own more than one dvd player but for those (such as myself) that enjoy watching foreign films or purchase/own dvd's from other country codes be forwarned this may not "play nice" with the equipment.So far so good. Great price - great picture. Great sound when hooked up to stereo bar and sub woofer.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 550 40' HD T.V.
Reviews.Author: Varda M. Marlow
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung 32" model 450 H.D. t.v.for a year.  I feel that the picture on the 32" is better than the new Samsung 40" model#550 H.D. t.v.  Sometimes, bigger is not alway better.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lyssie
Reviews.Content: My husband splurged to buy this TV, and now he's glad he did. Awesome color and sound. Cool features, although we haven't figured them all out yet.

Reviews.Title: Meets All Expectations
Reviews.Author: NotSoCasualObserver
Reviews.Content: Having done a fair amount of research before buying this model, I had a firm idea of what to expect.  My principal concern was whether the difference between the refresh rate of 60Hz offered by this model versus the 120Hz offered by the LN40A650 would make a difference to my viewing pleasure.  So far, I am happy to say it has not.  All other aspects of performance are as good as or better than expected.  I had no problems with initial setup, the video performance is spectacular, and though the audio is not great that has made no difference because I use a home theater system.  My son has used it for gaming with an X-Box 360 and is raving.  Even my wife, who was less than thrilled about having another TV in the house, has been enthralled.  For the money (especially with the price dropping now) I cannot imagine how this product can be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV for everyday use!
Reviews.Author: Jason M. Lake
Reviews.Content: Bought this about 1 month ago and am very happy thus far.  Delivery was great and set up was easy.  Bought this after reading the Consumer Reports review and feel it (the review) was right on--good value for the money.  Our two boys use it for childrens' DVDs and my wife and I use it for HD cable.  Good range of view, decent sound, and great picture.  Use it in a bright room and our boys will leave DVD menus on the screen for extended periods so thought LCD would be better than plasma.  Overall, this has been a great purchase and have no complaints thus far.

Reviews.Title: Expectations
Reviews.Author: R. Rietz
Reviews.Content: The unit has provided a great picture quality and has lived up to our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Static AC
Reviews.Content: I got this TV about a month ago and have nothing but good things to say about it. The other reviews are very accurate in what they had to say. The picture quality is outstanding. The delivery service was fantastic. In fact the only downside I've found with it so far is what has been mentioned before and that is that the IR sensor on the front of the TV is not very sensitive so you will need to be right in front of it to use the remote. Aside from that it really is a great TV and I would recommend it to anyone that is thinking about purchasing a new flat panel television.

Reviews.Title: Supports 1080P on PC connection
Reviews.Author: R. Poulton
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure it would support 1920x1080 over the PC connection. It does. Picture is crystal clear.FYI Best Buy has this cheaper than Amazon. I bought it there.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV & Delivery!
Reviews.Author: Lisa D. Brugger "Lisss"
Reviews.Content: We received the TV by carrier, they brought it, came in & set it up, plugged everything in and WALA wonderful picture!  The sound is great, it has great options and more things than I know what to push.  It has great picture quality and you can see it well from where ever you sit.  You'll love it, we do!!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING TV
Reviews.Author: Jessica Hurwitz "Jessica H"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV so much. It's crystal clear, has easy menus and is SO high def that without a HD receiver, it's a little pixilated. That's how advanced this TV is. It does not understand your puny normal digital connections. It needs an HD receiver.It's great. I love it and recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: dog lover
Reviews.Content: We love our Samsung LN40A550 40-inch TV.  The picture quality is wonderful.  I had followed the recommendations in Consumer Guide to select this TV.  Also, the white glove delivery was great.  The delivery man was accommodating and professional.  We have no complaints about anything.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Anna Mlynarczyk
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing. The picture quality on it is great and the black quality is perfect. I have heard many people complain about the sound quality but honestly it doesn't bother me, at least, I don't notice anything bad about it. Obviously if you don't like it, you can always get surround sound. The picture is amazing even when just watching off the air channels with a digital antenna. But everyone HAS to get a bluray player and play blurays on this TV because it's breath taking. Just how clear everything looks would make anyone never want to watch a regular tube TV again.A few other things: the menu is easy to navigate, the TV is extremely easy to set up right out of the box, it only weighs about 55 pounds, great price for a great TV.The only thing I do not like about this TV is the remote. It just isn't sensitive enough so when I press the buttons I have to hold it directly in line with the TV or it doesn't recognize it. I guess I am just spoiled because my PS3 remote is bluetooth and doesn't need to be pointed at the device to be recognized.Overall, probably the best purchase I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: Good product: No regrets
Reviews.Author: DC "Objective Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: PROS:I bought this from Amazon and it was delivered within 5 business days.  The price was $949.99 with free shipping and no tax. Hard to beat that price and the product carries good value for this price.  The setup was very straightforward and simple from removing from the box to watching TV shows.  The menu setup is fairly simple with or without reading the instructions.  The digital tuner works much better than the converter box I was using with my analog TV.  The colors are bright and the picture definition is very clear. The finish definitely does not reflect bright sunlight or lamps within the room. I have to shut the blinds in the room in the afternoon with my old analog TV but it was not necessary with the new LCD TV.CONS:The speakers are on the bottom and face downward. The sound definitely is not as clear and full with these speakers. You will have to turn the volume up higher just to hear everything clearly. And it does sound a bit "tinny" as others have noted. The artifacting is noticeable in fast panning scenes and sports. It is not bad enough to annoy me, but is noticeable. I do not know how this compares with the higher level Samsung models or other brands. One last thing, I  felt the remote was not laid out in the most efficient manner, but I am just extremely picky. The various buttons that you would most frequently use are spread out a bit instead of clustered together in the middle.  This is not a big issue, just personal preference.Overall, I would recommend this product which is a great value for the performance to price (at $949.99).  For those who want perfect performance in all areas, consider another model with better built-in speakers unless you will connect to a sound system.  Also, the artifacting will bother purists and sports fanatics.

Reviews.Title: best deal in town!
Reviews.Author: I. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I did my homework before making a decision to purchase this tv. Great product and great price!

Reviews.Title: This is what you want.
Reviews.Author: Thaddeus Burns
Reviews.Content: I recieved this today, a day before the shipping company's estimated date, and 6 days before Amazon's estimate. Nice!It's perfect. No dead pixels, DVDs practically look like Blu-ray already on this set, and I haven't even watched any HD video yet. The VGA/audio cord I've been using to hook up an XBOX 360 to a 22" LCD monitor plugs right into this and delivers a flawless 1080p picture.****NOTE TO XBOX360 USERS - you will need an adapter for the VGA cord's audio plugs to go into the single audio port for 'PC' sound, or plug them into your stereo/surround system. Don't worry - the headphone jack sounds as good as everything else.Standard definition looks about as good as it can on a 40 inch screen. In fact, some channels have started broadcasting select SD shows in widescreen, and those look remarkably nicer too (since it doesn't have to deform the image to display it in 16:9 aspect ratio). The remote also has a single button for switching between 4:3 and 16:9, so that's handy. I've heard people complain about the remote and/or menus, but I don't see a problem. It's all pretty easy.The audio quality is fine. You're not gonna have a problem with it unless you're an audio enthusiast or just used to having surround sound. Although I did find that it sounds much better if you turn on the "SRS Tru Surround XT" option. It makes the default speakers sound richer.If you're comparing this to the higher end models, don't. All you're deciding is whether or not you want to pay for extra functions and fancy touches you don't need. This is the set you want if you're looking for perfect 1080p picture. My experience so far has been complete satisfaction.From what I understand, I might have found as good as, or almost as good a display for much cheaper, but I took the 'safe road' and went with Samsung. I'm out 900 bucks, but I'm smiling!

Reviews.Title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Finn "biz journalist"
Reviews.Content: My techie brother and another work-friend both chose Samsung LCD. I followed their choice.Very happy.Customer support [the remote conked out] was as good as I've ever had. Price was better than retailer "specials," including Sam's Club.I save $75 in sales tax through Amazon.Others have experience problems with deliveries, but my delivery and setup was quick and efficient. Amazon is on its way to becoming the next Wal-mart.

Reviews.Title: Best quality in 40" TV
Reviews.Author: Bohyun Min
Reviews.Content: I have used it for one month now. It is not the best quality TV in 40" field. However, when we considers price and quality (it is full HD and under $1000), it is worth every penny. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: M. Birch
Reviews.Content: It is everything Consumer Reports said it is and the delivery and service by Amazon was top notch.  It actually came several days early -on a Sunday afternoon!- and when you watch HD it's unbelievable.  I looked at the other top rated brands:  Sony, Vizio, and Panasonic, and there is no comparison.  Sweet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD
Reviews.Author: Paul B. Davenport
Reviews.Content: The service from Amazon was great. The TV arrived sooner then expected.The product works very well. I had no problem setting it up. The pictures in HD are very sharp.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy another one....
Reviews.Author: E. Leon
Reviews.Content: I just want to say that I did a fairly amount of research on buying my first HDTV, and decided on this SAMSUNG model due to the fact that you get a good bang for your buck, and reviews I read elsewhere were great. I had read that the sound (out of the box) is not all that great, and thats true to some extent, but once I set the sound levels just right through a website I found online... It really really made a difference and now its not an issue at all. Recommend this TV 100%

Reviews.Title: Love your 40-inch TV
Reviews.Author: David Parham
Reviews.Content: We have had the 40-inch Samsung LCD TV for about 3 weeks now, and love it.  The only thing that is bothersome is using the built-in sound system.  It is a little toward the tinny side, but may just tip my wife over into acquiescing in my desire all along for a major sound system.  The bottom line, though, is that we love the set with or without an expanded sound system.  The picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Chris Cartellone
Reviews.Content: I bought this for $899 from Amazon. The delivery was excellent. Box arrived without even a dust mark. The TV itself is absolutely fantastic. I have hooked it to a MacBook and it works great. The picture is clear, with natural colors after I made some adjustments. I really enjoy the Matte finish as opposed to the Gloss on the higher models. Also, don't even notice not having the 120hz. I've watched sports and action movies without any problems. Great connections. Just wonderful overall.Only possible downside is the sound. It is okay and will work, but I now have it hooked into my home theater and what an improvement!! Also commercials get loud between shows and there is no way to control this. But for the price, it cannot be beat! Excellent images.

Reviews.Title: New SAMSUNG 40" HDTV
Reviews.Author: S. A. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Great product, great picture. I'm very happy with it, and with the quick delivery. Thank. you.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Adamalexg
Reviews.Content: Got this TV about 3 weeks ago and so far, so good. The picture is very sharp (especially with HD, of course). The picture settings are easy to switch and very handy for different ambient light situations. It wasn't as heavy as I thought it would be, and also quite easy to set up. Plenty big enough for our living room. No concerns.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME...
Reviews.Author: S. Leeder
Reviews.Content: Although it's not a huge TV, it's probably the best that I've owned up to this point.  The picture is unmatched.  I do agree that it's probably not the best sound quality, but a home theater will fix that easy.  A 40" cannot beat this TV, and it's a great price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: D. Crow
Reviews.Content: We received our order within three days of ordering.  We are very please with our order.

Reviews.Title: great product, great picture!
Reviews.Author: FORREST "FORREST"
Reviews.Content: [[ACSIN:B001418W2C Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV]]THIS PRODUCT SELECTION HAS MET ALL MY EXPECTATIONS.  THE PICTURE IS FANTATASTIC AND THE EASE OF INPUT/OUTPUT HOOK-UPS ARE HANDY. I WOULD RECOMEND THIS COMPANY AND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Be More Pleased
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Blackwell
Reviews.Content: I previously owmed a Visio which I thought was great until I went comparison shopping.  All the other TVs look like my old Visio.  Then I saw the Samsung.  That was it.  My decision was made right then. I went home and did some online pricing and Amazon won hands down.  The shipment and delivery were the best I ever experienced.  I ordered the set on Thursday evening and it was in my living room Monday morning.  The delivery company unboxed the set, placed it on my entertainment center and took the box away as well.  I was amazed.  Sometimes watching High Def programming, I am just in awe that this is my TV.  Plus I am only using a HDTV antenna!  The only small negative is the sound is a little tinny.  But I have the TV hooked up to my sound system so it really doesn't matter.

Reviews.Title: Slightly damaged, but still pretty awesome.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Graves
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this via the Amazon Warehouse section, which as I understand it sells items with dinged up boxes at a great discount.  I also bought an Xbox 360 Elite from Amazon Warehouse, which worked great, and was flawless inside of the slightly creased box.  This purchase, on the other hand, actually had a tiny amount of damage.  When it arrived, there was a tiny crack in the oval-shaped plastic base of the television, and the volume up button on the side was pushed in on one of the corners.  I'm impatient as hell when it comes to shipping/receiving, and the comparatively slight damage was only aesthetic in effect, so I kept the unit anyway.Aside from its less than perfect entrance, this television is amazing!  I've got a friend that has the same size television from a different company, and mine blows it away in terms of clarity, contrast, brightness, and overall quality.  I've got several game systems, and now have them all hooked up simultaneously, which has encouraged me to play them more often.  I also use this as an external monitor for my MacBook Pro, which definitely makes those work-from-home days all the more enjoyable--I tried this on a 46" Samsung, and it was simply too big to comfortably sit in front of and work with.  The 40" is definitely the best for my needs, and the television was totally worth its cost.Along with having arrived in a quasi-damaged state, I deducted one star because the speakers are kind of muffled-sounding.  Granted, the speakers are on the bottom of the unit and thus the soundwaves have to bounce off of the desk/tv stand/etc before they make it to your ears, but they sound somewhat muffled all the same.  However, if you crank them up, it's all good, and they can definitely get super loud--though you audiophiles out there may want to consider some sort of accompanying sound system in the future.

Reviews.Title: outstanding product
Reviews.Author: E. Slater "Slate999"
Reviews.Content: After waiting to purchase an LCD TV, a price drop (to $899) pushed me to purchase.  The Consumer Report high rating was justified.  Easy to setup and connect to the HT, DVD, Tivo.  White Glove delivery service was fine; unit arrived undamaged.  The picture is clear and the extra $500 or so was not worth the 46-inch size (or the 120 hz - that bothered my eyes in the store).  My brother is more the videophile and he loves it.  Would buy again and recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV, delivery not so much.
Reviews.Author: Edward Busuttil
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung LCD TV I've ordered from Amazon in the last year. The TV is fantastic. Beautiful color, clarity. Since it's a bedroom TV, sound quality is not so important, although I think it's just fine. The "white glove" delivery was anything but. The TV was merely dropped off in another bedroom, box and all...and then they left. No taking it out of the box, plugging it in or taking the packaging away.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Tom Rogers
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV.  I connected it to a new Direct TV HD Receiver with HDMI cable.  We have it in the bedroom.  The picture is sharp and flawless with great contrast.My only negitive issue with the TV was the delivery.  I ordered it from Amazon and they promoted the "white glove" delivery service.  The guy that delivered it was unaware of this and said that his only job was to drop it off.  Well, he did help me un-box it and lift it into place and take away the empty carton.  So....don't believe that two geeks will come to your home and deliver the TV and set it up.  Anyway, I'm happy with the price I paid for the TV and the quality.

Reviews.Title: review of LN40A550
Reviews.Author: William Goodson "Bill Goodson"
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed this TV. It was easy to set up and easy to use so far. Meets all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Consumer Reports was right on Samsung 40" LCD
Reviews.Author: Arvin Paff
Reviews.Content: Samsung 40" LCD model xxx550 was 100% right out of the box.  Amazon was best price and delivery was within 4 days. No problems and I will buy a Yamaha in-a-box home theater system soon from Amazon, I think.  Arvin

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550 and Amazon - Winning Combo
Reviews.Author: J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Trust me, you won't have to worry about whether or not you should have bought a Sony.  This TV is an excellent buy and will not disappoint you in it's picture quality.  I don't know what kinds of built in TV speakers the previous writers were comparing to the Samsung speakers, but they certainly are not horrible when compared to other LCD TV speakers. While they're not designed for listening to music, they certainly aren't as bad as people claim.  They are perfectly suitable for the majority of TV programs.Also, the "white glove" delivery service by Amazon was great.  Called the day before, showed up 1/2 hour early, and carefully delivered the TV.  Don't even worry about buying a big TV from Amazon.  It will arrive in perfect shape, and they will unbox it and help set it up.

Reviews.Title: lovablelou in Ohio
Reviews.Author: Lou Swanson "Lovablelou"
Reviews.Content: I had many misgivings of buying an expensive item like this on the internet. Amazon made a believer out of me!This is one beautiful TV. The price from Amazon was the best anywhere.I shopped for months for not only the TV but price. I always thought I'dbuy a Sony. After reading reviews and doing my homework I decided onthe Samsung LN40A550. I could not be happier with my purchase and theway Amazon handled the delivery. Straight to your door with free shipping.Free set-up and a TV that delivers a superb HD picture. I am getting oneof the best pictures on planet earth. No regrets...except maybe I shouldhave bought a 46" Samsung. I have had it for a month and you peoplestill considering a state of the art TV...buy Samsung..from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Viewing
Reviews.Author: Jack M. Savage
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough about the great picture that I am receiving! However, the audio is deplorable in comparison. You might as well get some sort of home theater system to enjoy the lovely picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Barbara in Denver
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our new TV. It is even better than I expected. I didn't know if people sitting to the side a bit would have a hard time seeing the image, but it is absolutely no problem. The only thing that seems a little different to me is that it doesn't seem very bright. I set the brightness pretty high and the backlight pretty high, too, and that is what looks normal to me. It might be because I am not used to HDTV. When I saw this TV in the store, the picture was definitely better than the Sony of similar size.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550 40-inch 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Patricia "organizing coach"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  The clarity and color are wonderful.  I was a little hesitant to order it online but the delivery was quick, easy and the delivery men hooked it up to our cable box in minutes and were gone.  I checked prices everywhere and saved about $300.00

Reviews.Title: Excelent, and good price
Reviews.Author: Junior Fernandez "Master"
Reviews.Content: Excelent, and good price. I'm very happy with my TV. Looks like a plasma TV

Reviews.Title: Out of Box to Up and Running in 15 Minutes
Reviews.Author: Wrightplace99
Reviews.Content: After being selected a CR Best Buy in the Dec. 2008 issue of Consumer Reports I decided to purchase the Samsung LN40A550. Amazon, at the time had the best price going along with free shipping, thought shortly after ordering Best Buy came out with a slightly lower price, so I placed my order. It took 11 days to arrive, the last 5 days sitting in a warehouse less than 25 miles from my home. Once it arrived it took only about 15 minutes from taking it out of the box to up and running. Its Quick Setup Guide provided simple, easy to understand, directions. Its Auto Programming functions made for a No Stress Setup!

Reviews.Title: 40 inch Samsung LCD
Reviews.Author: Stump
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my son. He had researched the Samsung flat panels and decided he liked the price and the features of this model. He loves the clarity of the picture and has not made one bad remark about the tv.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 40" TV
Reviews.Author: Jared Sonoma
Reviews.Content: The TV picture is amazing!  The digital tuner is much better than the converter boxes we had been using.  It tunes in channels we never received before.  The only drawback so far is that it is difficult to enter channels when you are using an antenna rotor.  The digital channels can only be entered by auto scan; when you rotate the antenna to point to other transmitters and rescan, it wipes out the channels you had entered by the previous auto scan.  I think this is a programming flaw - I am going to call Samsung to see it there is a work around.

Reviews.Title: samsung ln40a550
Reviews.Author: Romaric H. Michon "Starbetrayer"
Reviews.Content: My biggest purchases with Amazon went as smooth as possible, i was a bit scared of spending that much on an internet store. The picture on this TV is amazing. The HD is amazing, you really see the difference with non-HD programs.The menu is very complete and help to control over settings.I tested the VGA input, with my pc to put a show on it and the picture is really good even with lower resolution for the video file.Shipping was of course through CEVA and was great! They called to setup the appointment, were early, very delicate with the unit, and very personable. I would definitively renew the experienceA small con : the wiselink program is very limited to read videos files (few formats compatibles) when you plug a usb device.

Reviews.Title: Great picture even better value
Reviews.Author: Jeff Meunier
Reviews.Content: This is the best LCD you can get in the sub 1000 dollar range. I have had this TV for about 6 months and really enjoy watching blu rays on the set. I like this TV enough that I bought another one as a gift for my brother.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Perino
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Sound could be better, but it's not bad.  Integrates well with Samsung dvd player.  I tried hooking up my satellite radio to output through the tv speakers, but it won't recognize the audio signal without a video signal.  Therefore, I hooked up a video lead from the vcr to the same port to trick it.  I have to look at an annoying blue screen from the vcr though.

Reviews.Title: great tv & white glove delivery
Reviews.Author: SI booklover
Reviews.Content: I waited a long time before getting an large screen lcd. I couldn't be happier with this tv, the picture is crisp and the overall look of the tv is really nice. I had the white glove delivery and it worked as advertised, they brought the tv in set it up and made sure it was working properly before they left.UPDATE 8/22/2013I loved this tv but then one side of the screen started to have bars occasionally. This keeps happening more and more often until the entire left half of the screen goes dark. The tv is less than 5 years old and I already have to replace it. I'm really surprised that a Samsung tv didn't last longer.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LCD TV GOOD BUY PERFECT PICTURE
Reviews.Author: Ted Moyer "Ted"
Reviews.Content: Bought this unit on New years Day 1/1/09 at Circuit City for $999 and got the warrany through Squaretrade for $80 dont pay the big stores for an overprice warranty when Squaretrade give you in home service for large items like this.Perfect picture quality with Sony PS3 and Bluray titles. Any game rendered in 1080p will look stunning!!!! I do caution you that the regular cable input will make the set look like garbage. When you set up the unit let it go though its auto channel set up. It takes a good 20 mins to go through. There is also a noise reduction feature for the picture that I think is set to auto. Make sure it is on the max setting. It improved the picture dramatically.Very happy with the unit. My budget was $1000 or I would have got a 42 or 46 inch :) :( Anything larger that 40 inches can be harder to find a really nice wall unit.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: jean "Bjs"
Reviews.Content: I looked at Samsung, Sony, Toshiba and Sharp and this was the best TV of all of them in the price range I wanted to pay. Amazon was the best price and with no tax, free shipping you cannot go wrong. CEVA (shipping company) was great. I highly recomment this TV, also for Direct TV customers, read the flyer inside the box, you get free upgrade to HD dish and free upgrade to HD tivo receiver. I got this TV on 1/06/08 and Direct TV came on 1/09/09 to install the new dish and dvr. Great combo and I'm really happy with everything.

Reviews.Title: Amazing HDTV; Quality, Price point, the whole package!
Reviews.Author: Philly Phan
Reviews.Content: We have had our Samsung 40" for a little over a month now, and we love it!! I just don't know where to begin in writing this...If you've read other reviews, there simply isn't much more that I can add. It's an awesome TV, the picture will blow you away if you're switching over from STV, an excellent value compared to other models, and I think the fact that Consumer Reports rated it so highly says it all. I would highly recommend this TV to anyone looking to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 40" 1080P
Reviews.Author: Tumbleweed1 "Ken"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this television and the ease of setting it up. The only problem I had was with getting it delivered. The information on track your order was not accurate, I received a phone call telling me they would call back when ready to deliver and that should be the Friday after Thanksgiving. No one called and when I tried reaching the carrier no one knew where the televison was. It was fustrating to say the least.

Reviews.Title: Review of Samsung 40 Inch TV
Reviews.Author: Dennis J. Barlow "automobile maven"
Reviews.Content: This product was simple to install and picture is great. I have no negative comments except there is a loud snap sometimes when changing channels.

Reviews.Title: LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Walter Pretzel "Walter"
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered and the people doing the delivery took it out of the box and placed it exactly were I wanted it.I really like this TV.  The remote is easy to use.  I have an antenna, stereo, VCR, DVR and DVD player attached to this TV.  I also loaded some pictures to flash memory stick and the pictures look great.I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: samsung  ln40a550
Reviews.Author: John A. Locus "sparky"
Reviews.Content: A nice lcd for the price. Can only get 1080I and not 1080P which could be due to the age of my tivo recorder. Would like to get advice on how to tune or adjust colors for this set. The blacks could be blacker but for the price you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Alicia Duarte "Alicia"
Reviews.Content: The TV has really good images and it sounds really good, too. It is as good as any movie theatre.I'm really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Alternative
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: This is a superior value to the A650 or the A750 Series by Samsung. If you are considering the extra expense for the next size larger, you will fined this a better choice. I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: 40"Lcd Hd Samsung Television
Reviews.Author: Wanda Rinehart "wanda"
Reviews.Content: My husband has this in the bedroom. It is wonderful. The  picture is perfect. It was so easy to install also. I would recomend it to anyone. I recieved the television in less than a week. This is the second television we have bought through Amazon. Service is the greatest. Sincerely: Wanda R.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Couch Potato
Reviews.Content: Nice picture.  Takes awhile to learn the remote.  Leave the manual out while you watch TV and play with the different functions.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased.
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: Looks good and was very easy to set up. I hung it on the wall and it was easy also. The basic cable looks ok, the HD and digital looks great.

Reviews.Title: samsung ln40a550
Reviews.Author: philtorj "thetruth"
Reviews.Content: It's a very good TV for the price and when you use it watch blu-ray movies the picture is incredible. The speakers are really bad. So plan on using with a surround system or a sound bar other than that it would get 5 stars from me. I wish I didn't have to wait almost two weeks for delivery. Some other delivery options would have been appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic HDTV
Reviews.Author: Justin Mauck "HurricaneJuss"
Reviews.Content: After going back and forth between different HDTV models for about a month, we finally decided to go with this television, the Samsung LN40A550. We could not be any happier. It is missing a few key features that the newer models boast (120Hz, an extra HDMI, Touch of Color, higher contrast ratio, & ability to "seamlessly connect" to many other digital devices), but we decided that most of these features were ones we didn't absolutely need to have, and for about a $500 savings, we have no doubt that we made the right choice.This television has a myriad of inputs (3 HDMI, Components, Composite, S-Video, VGA). I can't imagine ever running out of inputs, which is a concern I've had with every other television set I've ever owned. The picture quality is fantastic. It doesn't support 120Hz, but after watching it for a week, I don't mind at all. The sound quality is also exceptional, with very little tweaking. Delivery service was great, too.As far as overall quality goes, I believe this TV to be on par with most of the Sony models out there, for a couple hundred dollars less. We were also impressed with the new Philips line of HDTVs... they also had great picture quality, so check them out, too.

Reviews.Title: A Great Buy
Reviews.Author: John T. Parker
Reviews.Content: I ordered this model for Christmas 2008 and have been using it for about 2 weeks now.  It is everything I had hoped for; wonderful picture right out of the box.  The shipping went flawlessly and was delivered into my house by the shipping company.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great way to buy one
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV because it was highest rated 40" in Consumer Report.  It has been great thus far.  I was somewhat worried about buying such a large item on Amazon, but the experience was tremendous.  Not only did I get a good price on the TV I wanted, but the delivery was great.  They stated it would take 7-14 days, but my TV was delivered in 3 days.  They called the day before to confirm delivery time, showed up as promised and set up my TV for me.  They told to keep the box just in case there was a problem, but it has been great from day one!

Reviews.Title: I Freaking LOVE this tv
Reviews.Author: Rudolph B. Marquis III
Reviews.Content: This TV is AMAZING to say the lease, Very quick, CLEAR picture, Great priceI expect nothing less from Samsung, Amazon said this TV would come on the 31th of December, I got it on the 24th, 4 days after I ordered, Best Christmas gift ever. I'm still abit giddy over how great it looks.No problem. Love it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: J. Kamm
Reviews.Content: This was our first experience with HDTV and the Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV fully met our expectations.  The picture is sharp and clear and we are very pleased with the product.  We also purchased the  Samsung BD-P1500 1080p Blu-ray Player and found the two Samsung products create a network when connected together.  Turing on the Blu-ray player and inserting a DVD will cause the TV to switch the video source from cable to the Blu-ray -- a nice feature that I had not expected -- this also allows several TV features to be controlled from the Blu-ray's remote.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HD
Reviews.Author: D. Beckwith
Reviews.Content: This set is excellent.  As an engineer I look for rendering flaws, especially in fast action sequences.  I've been watching it for a month and have yet to see any visible flaws.  This is a very impressive set.

Reviews.Title: Simply Beautiful
Reviews.Author: R. St Mary
Reviews.Content: Between my Wii and a standard DVD player -- the images are great. I can't want to see what full on Blu-Ray will do for this set.One feature that I really like is the USB connection that allows you to play things from your thumb drive or an I-Pod. It's great fun to sift through photos, music and such on the big screen. I'm also looking forward to using the laptop connection.If you pick this one up you will not be disappointed!CHEERS!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: JGpicker "guitar man"
Reviews.Content: Consumer reports recommended this TV as best in its class and it has lived up to the report and our expectations.  It was easy to install, and compatible with all our other equipment.  The purchase and delivery from Amazon was without a hitch.

Reviews.Title: extremely satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Ian Jack
Reviews.Content: I live in Trinidad in the West Indies ...I wanted to buy an LCD Tv for quite a while...after doing a lot of checking on the net I found that Samsung was the way to go and I fell in love with the 40A550 model ...I ordered in on the 19th of November from Amazon.com and got it exactly 2 weeks later through normal shipping to reduce the final cost ..in all it cost me a little over $10,000 in our money after paying shipping and all the high and exorbitant taxes here in Trinidad but I am extremely happy with it ...even the sound is okay although at times I play it through other speakers ...great product ..was up and working in less than five minutes after I took it out of the box ...thanks also to amazon.com ...great service ..thanks a lot guysIan Jack

Reviews.Title: Greatly pleased
