Reviews.Author: C. Gregurek
Reviews.Content: This is my first large screen tv and I am very pleased with it. The picture is amazing and when playing a Blu-Ray it gets even better. The picture is sharp and I see no ghosting or blur on anything I've watched so far. The only thing I could see that needs improving is the speakers. They do not produce a very deep sound and you have to turn it up quite a bit to hear clearly. It definitely needs a sound bar or a home theater setup added to get good sound. I am greatly pleased with the tv, even with the speaker issue I would buy this tv again.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: T. J. Putnam
Reviews.Content: After our 8 year old, 32" tube TV bit the dust; I researched for a month before buying the "Samsung LN40A550".The shipping was quick enough, the savings over buying from a retail store were significant, and the delivery as good as advertised. We are more than happy with our choice and recommend it highly. I also suggest using a HDMI cable hookup.The only shortcoming of this unit is the 60MHZ, as you do see some "slur" in fast paced action/sports programs. But the picture, sound, remote and set-up are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: D. Sobolewski "platinumclass"
Reviews.Content: I'm quite happy with this TV. Easy installation, clear picture and simply menu navigation are all highlights of the product. I'd go so far as to say that it's become a point of jealousy among my friends who didn't read consumer reports reviews (and others) and went for the cheapest models they could find. This one is best in class, as far as I'm concerned and I did some comparative shopping.The only con I can really think of is that the on-board sound isn't the greatest, but it isn't worth taking a star away from the product. I'm not saying that it sounds bad, but it just doesn't give the full experience that the picture does (if that makes any sense). It really isn't much of a problem if you run it though an external system - I run it through my stereo and my speakers have never sounded better.

Reviews.Title: Incredible LCD and the "White Glover Delivery" cannot be beat!!!
Reviews.Author: Brett A. Sigurdson "Sigson"
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I bought this LCD for a great price through amazon.com.  The first LCD we received has a imperfection on the frame so we rejected it, amazon sent a perfect replacement in a short period of time at no additional cost!  Highest regard for amazon and would recommend buying a tv through amazon to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Amazing television for the price
Reviews.Author: C. Potvin
Reviews.Content: I own this television for 4 months and I must admit, I love it.I am one that will prefer the clarity of the picture over size. This TV satisfy me totally.The image is really awesome. But then, this is to be expected with Samsung. I used to own a CRT screen for a couple of years, now a 22 inch monitor and I just loved the clarity of the picture. This TV belongs to the same category. Stunning.I used it with HD-DVR from Comcast and with PS3. I just watched The Dark Knight in BluRay this weekend and the scene turned in IMAX looked amazing. I could not believe how good it looks.This TV for under 1000$ is a steal.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jones Jay
Reviews.Content: awsome tv. i have owned for about a month awsome picture, i love it all!!!!shipping was fast, it was awsome, i love this tv.the only thing is if its in a small room it will make the room hot quick...

Reviews.Title: It's a winner, except for the sound
Reviews.Author: kevnlisa
Reviews.Content: Purchased this from Warehouse Deals by Amazon as re-boxed unit for a deeply discounted price and it arrived on time in like new condition. As we're new to High Def. we found the picture in HD stunningly great. Blades of grass on an ESPN HD college football game were plainly visible. Even though the refresh rate is only 60hz and we have no HDMI cable there is very little of the "smearing" that supposedly is a problem with LCD TV's. The non-glare screen on this model is also appreciated in our many-windowed living room. Although there is a website ([...] with tips to calibrate the picture we found it acceptably pleasing right out of the box on the brighter setting. Standard Def is mediocre, but after reading online and talking to the Comcast installers it's really not the TV's fault. The TV just accurately reproduces the faults in a low resolution broadcast. What is the TV's fault, and hence only 4 stars, is the subpar sound. Even after equalization the only two options seem to be boomy boxiness or grainy harshness. Still, since the picture is so good, better speakers can be hooked up, and the unit is fairly user friendly, it is enthusiastically recommended in the +/- [...] price range. Look for a deal in the Warehouse.

Reviews.Title: great picture quality for such a large screen
Reviews.Author: Fun Traveler
Reviews.Content: this is my 4th LCD TV.  I didn't think anyone else could top the 2 Toshiba's I've been using.  I love the durability of my Samsung cell phone and Amazon was selling this model out at a very good price so I bought.  I am very happy with the picture quality, especially the channels I get in HD. My only disappointment is in the mounting of the speakers UNDER the TV so that the sound projects DOWN and bounces off the surface you have the TV setting on. Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Ian Pond "iPond317"
Reviews.Content: This Samsung HDTV is amazing for the price. You could not possibly find a better price for a new 40" 1080P HDTV! I read many of the reviews on Amazon for the LN40A550 before making my final decision and I am very happy with my purchase.The concerns for the audio quality with the TVs speakers are not an issue since I am running audio through a surround system via the digital optical out.Delivery and Setup: CEVA was excellent, even though there was some confusion with my tracking number (a quick call fixed that). The TV is easily programmable and I really like the customizable input labels.Picture Quality and Settings: The LN40A550 has a spectacular picture! I have my HD cable box, Xbox 360, and DVD-1080P8 connected to the 3 HDMI ports and the TV recognizes the signals very quickly. The audio setup was simple for outputting to a 5.1 system through optical - turn off the TV speaker and voila. The LN40A550 also has a ton of setup options, but I really didn't have to do much adjusting because the picture looked almost perfect out of the box. There are several settings for sports, cinema, and game that make viewing more enjoyable, also.Overall, I give this Samsung 40" LCD HDTV 5 stars. Get it, you won't be disappointed!**EDIT** The issues many people reported with HDMI connections to the Samsung DVD-1080P8 have not popped up and I have had this TV for over two weeks now. This was a previously known issue by Samsung, however, calling Samsung technical support will get you to a solution. They will mail a firmware update (not available online) to you and you will need to install this in your DVD player.

Reviews.Content: Received my Samsung LCD TV a day early. The LN40A550 has been an excellent performer to date, I would recommend this model and I would also recommend the purchase through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv, very minor drawbacks
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Mantooth
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tv is absolutely amazing.  The anti-glare surface means ambient light doesn't really affect the picture at all (although it can be distracting when reflecting off the shiny frame).  Easy solution - close the curtains.  Not only are the colors rich and sharp, but the blacks are true, deep blacks.  Setup was a breeze, and it has really more inputs that I will ever use.  The remote and on-screen menus are very easy to navigate, and everything is fairly intuitive.  I've only had to go to the manual once to fix a setup option I screwed up the first time around.My complaints are very minor and don't really detract from my enjoyment of the tv.  1) The sound is very mediocre.  My living room is small, so I have to sit relatively close.  From about 6 feet away, it seems as though the sound is pointed directly down or back and I'm hearing it reflected off either the tv stand or the back wall.  It's just kind of stifled and tinny.  For some reason, this problem seems to lessen as I get further away from the tv.  It doesn't really matter as I have a surround sound system on order anyway.  2) The remote is kind of cranky.  It will not work unless it's pointed directly at the center of the tv.  After years of operating on the magical tivo remote, this one feels like target practice...gets a little frustrating.  As I said, these are minor inconveniences overall in relation to the value and quality of the television.

Reviews.Title: Excellent television at its price point
Reviews.Author: John Mason
Reviews.Content: I spent a few weeks looking at various LCD and plasma television sets in my local BB and CC to get a feel for what was out there.  I followed that up with another couple of weeks of research online into the models I was considering.  After looking at the feature sets on various models, I decided to go with the LN40A550 and ordered one from Amazon.  The delivery service was polite and fast and they were willing to work around my schedule to arrange a drop off time.The television itself is pretty awesome, overall.  The picture quality, from my unprofessional perspective, is at least on par with a large number of the plasma sets I looked at.  The blacks are as black as I've seen on an LCD and there is no perceptible motion blur.  The matte surface is excellent at handling the glare from windows opposite the telivision, which has been a blessing for me as I cannot rearrange the room.  I will agree with some of the other reviewers, though, that the sound quality from this television leaves MUCH to be desired.  The speakers aren't too bad, actually, but they are aimed downward and this causes significant muffling of the sound.  I'm lucky enough to have also purchased a set of speakers and an audio/video receiver, allowing me to avoid using the television's speakers entirely.I am a pretty avid gamer and this screen is excellent for gaming.  In game mode there is no perceptible input lag and almost no motion blur at all (some can be detected on occasion but still much better than my older LCD television).  I do wish that the different modes didn't gray out most of the configuration options, though.  Game mode is required to reduce input lag but the lack of tweaking that can be done to the picture in this mode is irritating.  It gives one the option of either enjoying no input lag and putting up with oversaturated colors or putting up with input lag in order to gain control over the color settings.All in all this is an excellent television and I would purchase it again.  The new Samsung models are pretty appetizing, though, and I'd recommend anyone looking at this model to also take a look at their most recent offerings.

The picture is amazing and it is very user friendly.  I recently watched Batman Begins on Blu ray and I cannot describe how different the experience is.  It's almost like watching a movie for the first time again.Thank you Amazon.com for not only offering great products for a great price, but also for outstanding service.Craig

Reviews.Author: TV Genius "The Man"
Reviews.Content: Pros: This TV has a sleek, modern look that has the picture to back it up.  The 30,000 d-contrast ratio is great....no ghosting. The blacks are wayyyy black.  The PC input and wiselink USB connection works like a charm.  The screen has little glare at the brightest times of the day.  I highly recommend this product. Great for the moneyCons: The PIP mode isn't the best.  I've found out that you are VERY limitied to what you can watch between PIP. You cannot change inputs between the PIPs. i.e. I can't surf the net with the PC input on one side, and view a DVD or Satelite reciever on the other.  Not a big issue or the reason I bought the TV. Speakers are on the bottom but again..not a big issue, TV still sounds GREAT!

Pretty sure he'll be knocking on my door this Super Bowl.I love this TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Price Great Product
Reviews.Author: Matthew Johnson
Reviews.Content: BackgroundLast year me and my wife purchased a 37inch Toshiba LCD.  The TV died so we found ourselves in the market for another LCD.After too many hours of online research i narrowed it down to the Samsung A550 and the A650.  We also looked at the Comparable Sony Line as well as the Sharp LCD's. Needless to say i decided on the A550.  After looking at both products in a showroom the A650 looked marginally better but not 200+ dollars better.When reviewing this product i am going to take price into account.  For the price i do not think their is a better value out their.  (That is coming from a biased owner)1.  Picture Quality and InputsThe picture quality is fantastic.  I have tested action Movies, Upconverted DVD's, Blu Ray and Sports (Preseason HD Football)  Their is no noticable motion blur.  The images are crisp and clear.  It offers 3HDMI inputs which is plenty (Cable box, Blu Ray, Video Games) and even has a USB port for Photo viewing (interface is simple and you can add music to the background while you watch your slide show).2.  SoundEh.  Not so great.  Tried it for a few minutes just to check it out and all i can say is not so good.  (Sound was not a factor in my decision making we own a very nice home theater set up.  It's hallow, and doesn't hold up when you raise the volume past 50%.  My personal feeling is you are never going to get good sound from any Flat screen because their is no depth to the speaker.  Small Speakers = Small Sound it's one area where smaller has not meant any better quality.(In my opinion).Generally people should consider investing part of their LCD budget on sound. You get a much more balanced set up.  Speakers in an old CRT tend to be better than those found in an LCD.OverallExcellent product by Samsung.  I feel like it offers excellent value for the price.

Reviews.Title: As advertised....
Reviews.Author: Stanley R. Sloan
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing this tv, I thorougly checked reviews by experts and the rest of us. Samsung had also been recommended to me by a Directv installer, based on the hundreds of sets that he had seen setting up Directv systems.  My other HD set is an Olevia HD, with which I am very happy.  However, this Samsung gives it a strong run for its money.  I am very pleased with both. The Samsung picture is incredibly good.  Particularly surprising is how well is handles the SD channels -- they are so sharp that they almost (not quite) rival the HD quality.  I would highly recommend this Samsung for its very high quality and convenience of operation. The one shortcoming, noted by other reviewers, is its relatively weak sound system.  However, I use a receiver and additional speakers for shows that benefit from enhanced sound and would recommend doing to with almost any HD tv.

Really, I can't say anything bad about this TV - everyone else's satisfied reviews are clearly correct.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: clunker "chu doin ?"
Reviews.Content: i love it. i mainly got it for my playstation 3 and directv. both look simply amazing. the sound is quite terrible, but i was prepared for that from hearing other reviews, so i hooked up my sony stereo and the problem was solved.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: S. Flowers
Reviews.Content: Got this Samsung LCD for $250.00 less than BestBuy with free delivery.  Great HD picture and looks great hanging on the wall in our family room.  I could be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Stebby
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this Samsung LN40A550 is better than I expected.  A great pairing with my satellite HD receiver.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV and Great Price
Reviews.Author: N. Parua "np"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on July 2. Got delivery in about a week, well before the estimateddate.TV is showing very nice picture. menu is intuitive, and easy to use.I purchased an upconverting dvd player. One point though somehow samsung upconvertingDVD player did not work with HDMI. So I replaced it with a pioneer DVD player, andit is working great. Without upconverting , or blue ray player or HDTV input youwill not be impressed with the quality. So far so good, hope it will keep up.Also I saw price change 3 times and got refunds.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely 5 star Performance
Reviews.Author: S. Madhu "rushi"
Reviews.Content: This TV beats the competion by miles. I always have liked sony for Televisions but this TV has changed my view forever. SAMSUNG is ahead of the competion. Even non HD channels look crystal clear on this TV. If you are looking for all around performance and picture quality than look no further.People who complain about speakers needs to understand that this is a TV not Home Theater system. This is TV has very good speakers and i dont see anything wrong with them.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: We were a little iffy making such a big purchase online. but we are glad we did! The picture and sound are great! even has the split screen if desired. We didn't know how well it would fit becuase it is bigger than our other tv but its so skinny that we actually have more room!

Reviews.Title: Awesome quality at an awesome price
Reviews.Author: Timothy A. Kuhblank "Timmaaaa"
Reviews.Content: This is a top quality piece. The picture is very crisp and unpixelated. I have never been happier with the purchase of a television.

Reviews.Title: Stunning picture - terrific value
Reviews.Author: Todd A. Doolittle "networkcowboy"
Reviews.Content: Almost three weeks into owning this Samsung LCD TV:1) the picture is stunning out of the box. Black levels, refresh rate, amazing granularity in how the picture could be tweaked.2) setup is incredibly simple. Plug it in and start using it. Just that simple.3) Service from CEVA was terrific. Ordered late Friday night. Installation scheduled the following Thursday for next day. Installers arrived early in scheduled time slot, were on site less than 10 minutes, and did a terrific job.

Reviews.Title: amazing tv
Reviews.Author: Grammy "Becky"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Samsung 40 inch LCD HDTV and it is wonderful.  We had went and looked in a store and decided to purchase the Samsung, but my son-in-law suggested we look online.  To my amazement, Amazon had the best price and we did not have to wait for a sale ( we had not had a tv to watch since the early spring).  It arrived in great shape, the delivery men were nice and polite and set it right in my living room. It it truely a great picture and we are well pleased.  I would recommend Samsung to anyone.  Thanks again Amazon.com for coming through! A satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: excellent hd tv
Reviews.Author: Bart Gladsapple
Reviews.Content: From the moment we plugged the tube in, pow!  Big, beautiful picture and clear sound.  Flawless performance.  I gladly recommend this HDTV.  Great big picture and superb sound.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: E. Suderman
Reviews.Content: We bought the Samsung from Amazon after checking out the retailers in our area.  No way could we have found as much quality for the price at any of the local stores.  The high contrast ratio makes a difference, the color and clarity is good, and operation is easy, with a nice, big,easily understandable remote.  The speakers are just adequate.  Some external sound would be preferable.  I'd recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear picture over the air. However ...
Reviews.Author: J. Reiser "Outdoorsman"
Reviews.Content: Being budget minded, I hooked up the antenna to this 40" wide-screen, getting outstanding results.  We used to get 10 stations with half of them looking fuzzy on the old 27" tube. Now we now have twice as many digital stations, including sub-stations, with a crystal clear picture.  Movies are now a pleasure to watch as the action comes alive in very high contrast beautiful color and magnificent movement with the 5 ms response time.Not having room for a larger TV, this fits nicely on our corner TV stand.** POWER PROBLEM. After owning this TV for over 2 years, the power took longer and longer to come on. Eventually, it would not turn on at all. Now, having bought a different brand 47" TV to replace it, I found out a little too late that there was a class action lawsuit due to this.The actual problem is not actually Samsung though. It is some cheap power supply capacitors from Taiwan. Unfortunately for Samsung, they used a lot of them. A Google search found me the information, including YouTube videos, I needed to repair the TV myself for a few dollars. An interesting article named 'Capacitor plague' defines the bad capacitors and what years they were produced.As soon as the capacitors arrive from my Amazon order, I will have an extra 40" TV. It will be useful.

Reviews.Title: Completely satisfied!
Reviews.Author: K. Rule
Reviews.Content: I shopped around everywhere for the right tv for me and my family.  We checked stores in our area and finally found the best price on Amazon.  Also, I searched the internet for reviews everywhere and decided on this Samsung LCD HDTV.  Perfect choice!  I am fully satisfied with the product and the picture is amazing.  All of the HD channels are clear and crisp and movies are awesome.  The only thing I've found that could be better is the sound...but I have surround sound amps so it wasn't a problem. I was a little worried about getting it shipped to me, but the delivery was very smooth.  The men who delivered the tv were very knowledgeable and set the tv up for me without any difficulty.  It was also done in a very timely manner.  Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase and plan to enjoy this tv for a while!

Reviews.Title: Pleased and pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: SDL "sdl"
Reviews.Content: I knew we would like the samsung 40 inch TV, we had done our research and purchased through amazon based on the price.  The no tax and "white" glove delivery sealed the deal, ....then I read a number of delivery reviews on amazon's site and got REALLY nervous.People had horror stories of dealing with the delivery service.  I can assure you we had the easiest and best time.The service called me and wanted to deliver the next day, I couldn't be home from work and asked for a different day, no problem.  I picked my time slot, meaning morning or afternoon and they came when I asked on the day I requested.White glove service is better then I could have hoped for.  They brought it into the house, unboxed it, set it up, tried it and took the trash with them.  What more could you ask for!Had we purchased it from a store we would have had to move it.  Best of all, delivery was free.I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch TV
Reviews.Author: A. Renshaw
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung HD TV. The first one was so outstanding that I bought a second for my beach house. A superb product with an unbeatable screen. Glad I moved to HD with Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Great 40" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Nancy Pickard
Reviews.Content: My friends at work highly recommended Panasonic and Samsung as the HDTVs to go with and that the best prices were online. So after looking at Best Buy and putting up with some 17-year old salesmen (who indeed knew more than I did), I searched the net and Amazon had the best price with free shipping. I love this TV!! It has a great picture, and I set it up on its enclosed stand (did not hang on the wall yet) and had it running within 10 minutes (to digital cable, not HD.) It took 8 of those 10 minutes to auto-check all the cable channels. The white glove delivery was excellent, the guy unpacked the box and let us see that the screen was intact and not scratched. I then proceeded to uhook my old TV and hook up my new Samsung and it fired right up! Most excellent! After 30 days it is running like a champ still! Bottom Line: Would I buy this again if I had it to do all over? Definitely YES!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: C. Keunen
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a couple weeks now and I absolutely love it.  It has a great picture and along with my new Sony upconvert DVD player my DVDs looks great.  I don't have HD programming yet, but even my Dish Network programming over an S-video cable look good.  This TV also has a good digital tuner in it for those looking for over the air tv stations.  My only complaint is the speakers.  They sound a little weak but with a little tweeking you can make it sound OK.  The TVs menus are also very easy to use and navigate and TV set up is a snap.  CEVA shipping was speedy enough but not what it is advertised to be.  I live about 90 miles from their nearest whearhouse so they farmed out the delivery to a different carrier.  I don't  think the guy who delivered it in a semi truck knew what a HDTV.  So needless to say I didn't get any help setting it up or even carrying in the house for that matter.  Overall I would deffinetely recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Tacoma
Reviews.Content: I received this Samsung 2 days ago. I had it up and running within30 minutes. No additional setting needed to be made. The picture was perfect. This is with a DirecTV system.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Eric Counselor
Reviews.Content: Shipping was right on time, and TV arrived in perfect condition! It pays to do a little research, it is the perfect size for my living room and the color, HD and picture are amazing. Very, very satisfied, would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV and a great price
Reviews.Author: middle aged bald guy "bald guy"
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend the Samsung LCD 1080P Televisions - bought a 46" last year and a 40 " recently. Both met my expectations. Amazon's price and delivery service was super ! I tell everyone I know about it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff Sill
Reviews.Content: After doing lots of research. I picked this great TV. Wonderfully amazing picture. The only thing that could make it better is more than 1 svideo connector. But it is very light weight to. Amazing, buy it you'll love it for sure!!

Reviews.Title: Sansumg LN40A550
Reviews.Author: Judy Tobin "JT"
Reviews.Content: This is a great Tv with a picture worth watching.  The service was good and was delivered in about 10 days.  I would recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Taube
Reviews.Content: Love the TV.  Beautiful picture and sound with plenty of connections.  Amazon's delivery was great, they set it up for me and helped me check for burnt out pixels, of which there were none.  Will enjoy for many many years!

Reviews.Title: Turns on and Off by itself
Reviews.Author: Tejo
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a little more than month ago from Bestbuy.  I was very impress with the picture quality, my eyes were glued to the screen, the clarity and color was amazing after I change around the picture setting. until a few weeks ago the TV turned off by it self and it turned on again after about 2 seconds. I thought I did something wrong with my set up. I went over the set up all over again according to the manual, but it is still happening.Until one night it happened twice about 30 minutes apart, and I decided to exchange it with the same exact model.  However, after about 2 weeks it happened again!!!! Twice in a row two different TVs??? are you kidding me?? I thought Samsung TV suppose to be one of the best??? I took it back and bought Samsung LN40B530 instead, a lower model but newer.  So far, it works just fine, and picture quality is just as amazing. Don't buy this TV, save your time and money for other model!!

Reviews.Title: Worked for a week then died
Reviews.Author: Philip J. Graham
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv and set it up and thought the picture quality was great and that the sound quality was so so.  This is fine since I hooked it up to a surround sound system and used that.  It worked fine for about a week and then one day I can home, turned it on and there was no picture.  I had sound, but absolutely no picture.  I couldn't even get the menu or sound volume to come up.  I called Samsung and they told me that they would send someone out to my house to repair it.  As it turns out, they won't actually send someone to the house.  I have to drive 40 miles to bring it to the repair shop, which is where the tv is now.UPDATE:It took about a month before I finally got the tv back.  It was very annoying to have to drive to and from the repair shop that was so far away.  Apparently there was a catastrophic failure of the power supply, mother board, and LCD screen.  In fact, they had to replace so many of the parts, the repair person told me that I'm basically getting a new tv.  Since I had the tv fixed, it has worked well for the past few months.  The picture quality is good (even though the sound still stinks).  In all, I am satisfied with the tv itself.  As for quality, I will give Samsung the benefit of the doubt.  Maybe I just got unlucky (which is basically what the repair people told me).  I asked the guys at the repair shop which tv's they see the least, and they said Samsung and Sony.  What I found completely unacceptable was Samsung's lack of customer service.  I feel as though I was lied to when on the phone with the Samsung help center.  The tv repair people also blamed Samsung for the long repair time.  They said that Samsung questioned whether so many parts actually failed (which caused a red tape delay) and then was very slow in mailing out the parts to the shop.  If you are going to spend so much money on an electronic device, I would hope that the company would have quality customer service to match their product.

Reviews.Title: Make sure YOU'RE available!
Reviews.Author: D. Johnson "simple man"
Reviews.Content: The TV is great.  No problems.If you get the "white glove" treatment, be forewarned.  It took me two weeks to arrange to get the set after it had already arrived in my state.  It was sent to a holding place 90 miles away.  The delivery service is in our area twice a week, only from 8:00 to 12:00 on Tuesdays and Thursdays.  Since my wife and I are both teachers; there is no way we could be here.  They transferred our set to another shipping company and  delivered it to my parents' home instead, ergo no "white glove" treatment involved.The TV has been great.  The picture is adequate, the sound is acceptable, and the price was what made it worthwhile.  I'd say buy it, but read the fineprint on the shipping rider.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds my expectations
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: I just got the Samsung LN40A550P and am very impressed.  The delivery was incredibly fast (they called me two days after I ordered and were ready to deliver).  The actual delivery was promptly in the promised time window courteous and helpful.  Setup was easy...the TV has an awesome picture.  HD video over antenna is great and upconverted DVD's are stunning too.  I'm sure they will be even better when I finally get a Blu-Ray (after prices drop).  The low amazon price, no tax and free delivery make this an offer not to be refused!All in all the entire experience exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: I'm So Happy...
Reviews.Author: Michael Wyler "Michael W"
Reviews.Content: I have the 40A550 almost a week and the picture is amazing.  I love the HD channels (cable).  The sports HD is unbelievable.The free delivery was good and the driver took it out of the box and tested it out, and took the box away.Delivery only took a week from the order.Amazon honors their 30 day price policy.  The price went down 3 times already and I received $92 worth of price reductions, no problem.The sound is fine.  The hdmi cables I bought for about $12 each from amazon work well. It was easy to set up with the new cable box.I also bought the Samsung upconverting DVD (P8) for $79, amazing pictures from regular DVDs.Samsung DVD-1080P8 1080p Upconverting DVD Player

Reviews.Title: Worked for years
Reviews.Author: David Sullivan
Reviews.Content: This was a great TV purchase off Warehousedeals. Lasted for a few years then something on one of the boards went. Couldn't figure it out. I have a decent background in electronics and electrical engineering but I couldn't see any bulging capacitors or any other components that looked bad. Installed new ones anyways but couldn't save it. Sold it on craigslist and moved on. TVs are relatively inexpensive these days anyways.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed, frustrated, and upset
Reviews.Author: smith "galaxy"
Reviews.Content: Developed orange and red streaks after 3 months covering half the screen.Serviceman says something must have hit it from outside but no outward signof damage -not a scratch.Still Samsung will not repair or replace. They say physical damage is notcovered under warranty. I swear that we did not do anything to it but theydon't care so I'm out a thousand dollars.

Reviews.Title: t.v.
Reviews.Author: Germaine M. Mccarroll "surgtech95"
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new tv. Could not be happier with the speed and personal touch when it was delivered to my home.

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: Grouseking
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product.  Amazon was amazing.  Delivered when promised in perfect shape.  I'm extremely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TV FOR THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: Tonya R. Jordan
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREAT TV FOR THE MONEY. FREE SHIPPING REALLY HELPS TOO.Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: NICE PICTURE -LOUSY SOUND
Reviews.Author: MONIQUE SCHWARTZ "palm user"
Reviews.Content: THE  TV WAS DELIVERED ON TIME - WE HAD "WHITE GLOVES SERVICE"- THE TV WAS NOT PROPERLY CONNECTED TO OURRCN  HD-BOX TO GET THE BEST IMAGES AND THE SOUND/VOLUME WAS NOT PROPERLY DONE- IT TOOK US SEVERAL CALLS TO RCN TO GET THE BEST IMAGE AND HAVE THS SOUND ADJUSTED - THE "WHITE GLOVES EXPERTS" DID NOT BOTHER TO ACTIVATE THE ENERGY SAVER- THE PICTURE IS VERY NICE- EXCELLENT COLOR AND REAL BLACK- IT IS SOMETIMES  DIFFUCLT TO UNDERSTAND CLEARLY THE DIALOGUES IN MOVIES AND QULITY OF THE MUSIC IS VERY AVERAGE- THE SOUND IS MUCH BETTER ON MY OLD SHARP  LCD- I GAVE IT A 8 OR ONLY 4 STARS

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV's have different quality
Reviews.Author: H. Thompson
Reviews.Content: There are big differences in quality among Samsung HDTV's, even among LCD's.  I have bought 2 from Amazon, and shipping etc. was wonderful, but this model is definately not up to the quality of the other one (which was more expensive).  This model give a lot of "shudder" to figures which are moving, as in football players in a game, especially in closeups.I recommend paying a little more for a better quality product, but I think Samsung is still the best quality and value.

Reviews.Title: The audio is terrible, otherwise very nice
Reviews.Author: Wild at Heart
Reviews.Content: Even though a number of reviewers have commented on the substandard audio, I figured "how bad could it be?".  Make no mistake, this is the absolute worst TV audio known to mankind.  A portable AM radio speaker would be 10x better.  Seriously.  Do not even think about using this TV with the built-in speakers.  You will be sorry.The good news?  After connecting my living room stereo system to it I was much happier.  Everything else about this unit is very nice.  Once I upgraded the audio I was very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great price--very pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Mom in Hooville
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for about a month and have been very pleased with it overall.  We purchased it for TV viewing only (not for game playing, etc.), and we think it was a great choice for the money (we bought it in a bundle with an XBox 360, so this TV was under $1000!)  The HD picture quality is perfect, and the picture quality of most SD broadcasts is fine.  Some SD channels are better than others, like Fox News looks fine, but the PBS stations are very grainy.  DVDs look spectacular.As for the sound quality, I agree that it's a little low because the speakers are on the side of the TV.  They are narrow, and some stations do require more "up" volume to hear.  So, don't expect this TV to give you the "home theater" sound without investing in a separate speaker system.Amazon delivers this item through a special courier who will bring the TV inside and set it up (if you want).  That, combined with the low price, no tax, and no shipping, made this a wise buy for our family and we've enjoyed it so far.  No complaints about the product or Amazon service.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Brian Crocker
Reviews.Content: I purchased an lnt4665 a 6 months ago for 1700$, gave it an exceptional review. I purchased this one yesterday for my girlfriend for 1141$. The only thing I can complain about, between the two, is the fact Samsung released upgraded models in the LN series for about 300$ cheaper than the last models.This ln40a550 model is every bit as good as my lnt4665 with higher contrast ratio, I highly recommend it. Shipping just like my last one was great too, I ordered it Monday morning at 1am and picked it up this morning at 1am. If your in the DFW,TX area you can pick it up within about 12 hours at the CEVA warehouse near the airport. Amazon was good so far too, the LCD went down 52$ since last night and I called and got a credit.Compared to my LNT4665 model, the menus are alot faster and the contrast is better. Overall the LCD seems like a real upgrade from the previous models. Didn't notice much else in the hour-ish it took me to set it up, wake my girlfriend up at 3am to show her, and leave. Happy watching.

Reviews.Title: Sweet HDTV
Reviews.Author: T. Motto
Reviews.Content: Very sharp, excellent picture. No pixel defects at all. Setup was quick and simple. Delivery was hassle free, and the price from Amazon is much nicer than the local merchants.Initally had issues with getting 1080i signal to the TV - turned out the prior owners installed marginable CATV cable, then hammered steel staples in it when threading it through the attic! :-) Cable may not even have been RG6! Replaced the CATV backbone with RG6 Quad Shielded RG6 ( can get this at any Home Depot or Lowes ) - made a huge difference, and we are now watching the Olympics with a fantastic picture. So beware - not all cable is equal. Be sure yours is stamped with the type ( RG6 ). Quality cable will be sweep tested to 3GHz - and will say so stamped on the cable itself!  All is well and happy here.

Reviews.Title: Newbie review - good stuff
Reviews.Author: Sammie "tekkie"
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD TV and I am satisfied.  The picture is really clear and there are lots of viewing options which I'm probably not familiar with, but if you're simple like me, you'll enjoy this item.  A couple of minor things I noticed was that it takes a few seconds to "warm up" from the time you press the power button to actually seeing the picture, and it seems that this time has increased since I first got the tv a few weeks ago.  Another thing is some non-HD channels are slightly pixelated here and there, but I assume that's common and not the product's fault.  But like I said, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great product, price and service --- I take it back about the product
Reviews.Author: L. Van Deusen
Reviews.Content: We did the "search all the chain stores", too.  Once we decided on the Samsung, we tried to buy the A530 at a major department store, but it was out of stock.  I went back to Amazon and for the same price as the local stores' A530, we could buy the A550.  Great deal!  Plus, no tax.  We knew we wanted a Samsung, so with the price and the good reviews of the "white glove" service we bought it.  Glad we did!  The service was excellent and they even worked with our timeline and knocked it down to a 2 hour window.  So, if you know you want this TV, I say buy it from Amazon because of the price and the service.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: HAWNBRAD
Reviews.Content: I was all set to buy the 2001 Samsung model LNT 4071.  I am glad I waited because the Samsung 2008 model LN40A550 40" 1080p LCD HDTV appears quite superior, to me, and a little cheaper if you catch it at the right time and right place. I got a great deal at Amazon.com on mine.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT EXPERIENCE
Reviews.Author: Walter R. Davis
Reviews.Content: Had TV for almost 30 days and am well pleased.  Plug and Play right out of the box to a DIRECTV HD Receiver and pic was outstanding with no adjustments.  TV arrived two days ahead of CEVA estimate by Today Delivery subcontractor from LAX.  Delivery man was outstanding, ensured that TV was working properly before he departed.  Would recommend Amazon.Com to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Quality 1080p at a great value.
Reviews.Author: Shaft "Jay"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung 1080p television that I have purchased. This 40" model has an excellent picture quality, easy GUI setup menus and quality sound. I was also interested in the 120hz model, but chose this model as it was $400-500 less. There is also a videogame mode that seems to increase framerate/picture quality issues, and is a plus for gamers like me that play XBox360 and the PS3. Blu-Ray discs look fantastic as well.This is a quality television at a great price. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Can only rate Samsung's service, because my brand new TV won't turn on
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I've been researching and waiting for the right time to purchase this TV.  It hit a price I liked, so I pulled the trigger.  It arrived at my house about a week after I purchased it, and the box was in pristine condition.  I take it out, set it up, and the dang thing won't turn on. I tried several different outlets, but nothing.  Seemed pretty simple, like a reset button or fuse or something, so I called Samsung.  They were absolutely no help and told me they would call back in 4 business days to set up a service call.  They wouldn't discuss anything technical with me.  So I have to wait for a week for them to set it up, 2 weeks for them to get here to even look at it, and who knows how long to fix it.  That was unacceptable so I called Amazon.They are shipping another TV right away, and will pick up this defective one.  My new TV should be here in a week.  So Amazon comes through, yet again.  For 10+ years, I've purchased pretty much everything I buy through Amazon, and only 3 times have I had a problem.  All 3 times the issue was either with the shipping company or defective equipment, and Amazon fixed the problem immediately.  They are by far, the best retailer I've ever dealt with, and continue to earn my trust.  Thanks, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: weeks old amd died
Reviews.Author: M. Burke "denerzabell"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv on December 20th 2008 was shipped on Dec. 22nd. It is now Feb. 16th , a little over 6 WEEKS and the TV is broken.  On the screen half has  a picture and the other half looks like some heat sensore. I have to wait for a  service call and they won't be here till the end of February. This is a mess. I would not buy another samsung ever!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good TV, bad Service
Reviews.Author: Y. Malkin "mataktak"
Reviews.Content: The TV is fine.  Not as great as some of the reviewers here say, but the picture is decent.  But be careful when buying from Amazon.  I bought the TV on December 12. A day later the price dropped by a $100.  I wasn't worried, because Amazon used to refund the difference if they discounted an item a few days after you bought it.  But when I asked for such a refund, I found out they secretly canceled that policy sometime in September, and wouldn't budge.  I used to just go to Amazon whenever I need something, and if the price seemed right, buy it.  Now I will think twice and wait some time before making a purchase.  It used to a be a more pleasant experience.  Oh well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD Picture in Picture doesn't work for composite video source
Reviews.Author: D. Stein
Reviews.Content: My parents bought the Samsung LN40A550, which has good reviews in consumer reports.  This TV has only 1 tuner, so picture in picture (PIP) requires another source. In the manual it does states: You can view Analog TV broadcasts on the PIP screen (sub-picture) when the main picture is from an external device connected to HDMI 1,HDMI/DVI 2, HDMI 3, Component1, 2 or PC.So if you are expecting to use an external device, which is composite video (the yellow video RCA jack on a VCR) to supply a 2nd TV tuner source you will still not be able to do picture in picture.When I got my Samsung 50" DLP years ago it had dual tuners and PIP was a simple PIP button on the remote.  However the current Samsung LCD and DLPs along with many other tvs appear to have this limiting ability to perform PIP.  Even if you do have the required source (componet/HDMI/PC) the process to active the PIP is not just a PIP button click on the remote.  Other than the PIP issues the Samsung LN40A550 is a fine tv.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT EXCEPT FOR FINANCING!
Reviews.Author: Peter Schwarz
Reviews.Content: Over the 4th of July holiday, Amazon.com offered a 36-month (No Interest) promotion for various HDTV's including this model.  In the August 2008 CONSUMER REPORT, this model (Model 550) received top ratings for overall performance and superb picture quality.  With the enticement of the CONSUMER REPORT review; the ability to pay the unit off over three years, No Interest; and being able to watch the Olympics on a 40" screen, I was hooked.I rated this product with only 4 stars primarily due to the financing promotion because I wish to point out that the 36 (or 24 or 12 month) promotion payment plan is not what it appears.  I presumed that the final cost of the unit would be divided into 36 equal payments over the designated period.  When I received my first statement I found that logic to be false.  The Amazon.com Store Card is issued by GE Money.  They bill in the following manner:  1/24th of the open balance as a minimum payment each month.  That means that for whatever promotional time frame you sign up, THERE WILL BE NO EQUAL PAYMENTS! You will be paying much more in the first year of ownership than an equal payment would have cost.  Also be aware:  After 36 months of minimum payments (or 24 or 12), as a result of this calculation method, you will NOT have paid off the television.  I did an Excel spreadsheet and found that after 36 months I still owe $237 for the HDTV.  That means if you don't pay it off totally in the 36th payment, all of the hefty finance charges will be added to your 37th month statement!  The 1/24th method of calculation was NOT explained when I signed up for the credit card.  Regardless, I still think that the deal is great....but the payment structure should have been explained.Inasmuch as this is my first HDTV. I was delighted to find that it was a superb purchase decision. I agree with most of the Amazon reviews regarding the unit. Especially the fact that at a louder volume, the 10 watt speakers tend to vibrate and give a high pitched sound.  You should consider a surround system so that you truly get the best out of this television.  (My next purchase).  DVD's are awesome!  And at this size screen, even letterbox looks great.  I also like the inclusion of a USB port for the use of showing digital photographs right off the camera.  I have always been impressed with Samsung products and this HDTV is no exception.  I compared the 40" size at some retail stores with units from other manufacturers and found there was no comparison in quality of picture.If you want the best LCD HDTV viewing, buy Samsung.  I should mention that I live in the Chicagoland area and receive my picture signal through a regular airwaves antenna.  The High Def signals are unbelievable.  No need to subscribe to any cable or satellite services.The opening ceremonies of the Olympics last night were terrific on the HDTV.

Reviews.Title: TV Great Shipping a Nightmare
Reviews.Author: G. Shaw
Reviews.Content: No issues with the television.  Great picture,  great sound and met expectations.  I guess you get what you pay for with FREE shipping.  The carrier held the product for one week and refused to deliver when I made arrangements to be home. Had to argue about a time to receive.  In the future I will avoid free shipping, its not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD Choice
Reviews.Author: Michael Koslow
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy, Amazon service excellent. but most important the picture quality on the 40-in. screen is astonishing. Exceeds performence of my older 26-in. Samsung I got more than 2 years ago. Only peculiarity is that I must keep TV on when playing CDs through my DVD player. Minor issue. I think this TV rocks!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: horsegirl
Reviews.Content: This tv is fabulous. In HD the picture is unbelievable, and in regular digital, the picture is good--it's just that watching the hd channels spoils you. The sound is just fine for us. We see no need for a surround sound system. Delivery went off without a hitch. The price was fabulous. I wish I had another thousand dollars to get a second tv for the workout room. I wouldn't think of buying any other model or using any other store.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - one big minus for cable customers
Reviews.Author: Chilenochoro
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV as other have already said except for one thing. It does not have a cable card slot, so if you have cable and don't want just the most basic channels you need to rent the large cable box (especially to get HD) instead of just the tiny cable card, which sort of defeats the purpose of having a compact and sleek LCD.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jazzyj
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV now for 1 1/2 and my whole family loves it.  The picture is great and for those gamers out there it really provides a very vivid experience.  My boys play X-box on this tv, even though, they have tv's in their own rooms.  This was my second Samsung LCD and I have not been disappointed with the reliability, ease of use, or the quality.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Stephen Sproull
Reviews.Content: I walked out of Best Buy with the LN40A550 for $720 brand new so that go me started on the right foot!  I have had this TV for a week and absolutely love it.  I have my macbook pro hooked up via DVI > HDMI and it looks stunning.  I also purchased a Sony DVD player (DVP-NS710H/B) and so far it has done a great job of upscaling DVDs to the 1080p resolution over HDMI.  Also, regular cable tv doesn't look as bad as I thought it would after reading some of the reviews.  While the native sound is unimpressive, I have a surround sound system hooked up to it.Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase and would definitely consider buying Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Unbeivable Picture Quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeri K. Thomas "Running Woman"
Reviews.Content: This is the most beautiful picture quality I have ever seen. I knew Samsung was the best, but the price was so worth it. I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a fabulous HD TV at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550
Reviews.Author: Esmail G. Hamadani "Essie"
Reviews.Content: A couple of nonclaimers I want to put out there. I have yet to calibrate the TV and Comcast compression sucks. HD 1080p so far on cable is pretty non-existent so for a full appreciation of the product you will have to connect a console or a PC...I'm not sure if 1080p is supported via DishNetwork or DishTV. The TV itself looks great, blacks are black and colors are vibrant. I would make the purchase again. This isn't 120hz just to put it out there for you folks not in the know and as much as it may seem that is thing to get, I'm pretty comfortable with my purchase. Plus its cheaper....

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: A. Schilling "Coffee snob"
Reviews.Content: Bought this with Samsung Bluray player.  Great deal from Amazon with free shipping.  Picture quality is very good,I'm not even sure I miss the 120 MHz refresh.  This is my first LCD TV.  I agree with others that the remote can be finicky and it is a dust magnet.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Michelle M. Cave
Reviews.Content: Very pleased - my husband loves the big screen and beautiful picture for all sports! 1080p definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Incredible color ... superior price ... PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Kuelbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased a SAMSUNG LCD HDTV on the recommendation of several prople in the television business.  I was not disappointed.  What amazing color!  I was, however, concerned about buying from AMAZON, thinking that I could get any necessary service and, if necessary, set-up from a local vendor.  AMAZON, however, offered the best price (by a mile!) and delivered and set-up the set for me WITHOUT ANY EXTRA CHARGE!  The set-up, by the way, was easy .... simply involving positioning the set, attaching the cable, putting the provided batteries in the remote and power up!  The picture is fantastic ... the black is crystal black ... the colors astounding.  If I have any reservation, it is the sound.  Not particularly good ... probably needs an ancillary set of speakers.  But for the price it is EXTRAORDINARY.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing
Reviews.Author: hotchas "hotchas"
Reviews.Content: Went from a 19in TV to a 40in Samsung and very satisfied.  I had checked different TVs for quality, view-ability, price, reputation, etc, for 3 months and finally decided on this set for $799, the best price in April 2009.  Even the tuner card [I use a roof antenna] was more powerful than the converter box I bought with the gov't coupon.  Very happy all around.  PLUS, when I registered at the Samsung website, I was given a 3 month extension on the warranty for FREE.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Murphy "Earthelph"
Reviews.Content: We love it!  It is an instant setup with intuitive menu.  The picture is extreamly crisp on digital stations but unbelievable on high definition.  We receive signals from our rooftop antenna which does not yet have a rotor so only stations broadcasting digital from one direction about 40 miles away come in well.  Digital stations are all or nothing but the signal strength can be displayed.  We expect that with a rotor to turn the antenna other stations will be just as good.Before purchase, we did our homework and found this Samsung T.V. was highly rated and we find that rating well deserved.Amazon's bottom line price was the best we could find.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD is great!
Reviews.Author: Lynette Brocht
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTVWe had researched LCD's for almost a year and went to some of the box stores to actually view the models we thought we might be interested in.  The Samsung LN40A550 ended up at the top of our list.  We were able to get the best price through Amazon (the prices do fluctuate, so it's worth the effort to be patient and check on the price over a period of time) Amazon's delivery service is great!  We received our TV within a few days.  The delivery service calls to arrange a convienent time to deliver and set up your TV.  It is unpackaged, inspected and plugged in to check the blue screen.  We have been completely satisfied with the sound, color and quality of the set.  There is a multitude of adjustments you can make to get exactly the picture and sound you want.  We were especially impressed by the sound quality of the set.  While we may add a surround sound system in the future, it really isn't necessary with the 550.  One note...we did not have HD when we purchased the set.  We added the feature to our cable a few weeks later and I have to say the picture quality is better on the HD channels...no noticable pixeling, even at close range.  I would say our overall experience has been a very good one with both Amazon and this TV!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for your buck
Reviews.Author: J. VILLALOBOS
Reviews.Content: TV looks awesome, I bought this to use w/ my Xbox & what a difference it made. The sound is not the best ever but if you have a surround system, it won't matter. Picture looks clean & you can even fine tune to your liking through the menu options. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Darryl Cook "crim"
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing TV. I have had it for about 9 months now and I have been loving every minute of it. I have all my video sources hooked to my Onkyo TX-606 and then hooked to the TV via HDMI. Blurays and PS3 graphics shine on this TV. This TV truly shows what HD is suppose to look like. The price is still the same as what I paid nearly 9 months ago. That makes me very happy with my purchase. :)

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Don Stevenson "DKS-SoCal"
Reviews.Content: MY OTHER TV AN akai=A BAD tv, THE SAMSUNG is GREAT easy to set up the base is already attached. I do recommend using a Sony DVD player I use the RDR-GX300 model, OWNED IT FOR ALMOST 3 YEARS NOW AND IT WORKS GREAT with the Samsung LCD TV as well. On the technical side if u use a cable or satelite box check with the respective company for the HD box and deffinately get and HD box that is HDMI capable. from the box to the TV it's the best. On the DVD player whatever make or model u have use an S_VIDEO cable to connect to the TV. Other than that enjoy your viewing...THE PICTURE IS GREAT GOOD SOUND OFF THE SET TOO.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Unit was delivered on-time; setup by delivery company.  Ready to use out of the box with very little tweaking.  Extremely happy with the purchase.  Took about a week to adjust from a 27" to a 40" but now that we have, can't imagine watching anything else!!

Reviews.Title: Just what the doctor ordered
Reviews.Author: KC native
Reviews.Content: I checked out the Samsung LN40A550 at both Best Buy and Circuit City and really liked the picture it was delivering. I have a 50" Samsung DLP and really love it. So going after another Samsung was a no brainer. One just has to be patient (about 4 months)and keep checking the sites looking for that right price and Amazon came through for me. It was delivered on time, the delivery personnel removed it from the box and set it up for us in our bedroom. The picture was great with regular cable hook up and if you go through the channel set up it via cable it will pick up HD programing for a lot of channels. Gives it a weird channel number i.e. 5-1 and that picture was great at 720p. Once I installed the HD box AWESOME. For the geeks out there the set has plenty of options to improve the picture, sound etc. Highly recommend this set and my dealings with Amazon have all been positive.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Willow
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents after their 12 year old 32" TV went out and they had to use a little 19" for a while. We were going to get another 32" but talking to my siblings and researching online and at stores we decided on a 40" so I started to look for the best price and I found at it here at Amazon as usual. We were not looking at Samsung's because they were on average $[...], but then I found this one for $[...] less and I am so happy with it.The sound and picture is great, the glare is minimal. The viewing angles are really great. I can't think of any negatives on this TV it is great quality for a great price I highly recommend it if you are not looking for the most updated technology.UpdateI have had the TV awhile now and the only complaint is that unless you have surround sound on movies you have to crank the volume WAY up to like 40 other then that is is still great.UpdateIf you turn the surround sound on the sound is much better on movies and TV shows in general, also if you change the color mode to normal and the mode of the TV to standard it is a much better picture and saves energy, it will automatically go from darker to brighter depending on the brightness of the room.

Reviews.Title: Keeffy
Reviews.Author: Keith Cuffy "keeffy"
Reviews.Content: Great Item!  Could have done with a HDMI cable inclusive in the package.  Easy to install and very good clarity of picture/video.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: George H. Cater
Reviews.Content: Great TV - perfect for our bedroom - outstanding picture - very happy with purchase, shipping, quick & careful delivery.

Reviews.Title: Love my Samsung LCD!
Reviews.Author: Lee "Lee"
Reviews.Content: I did alot of research before I settled on the Samsung, including playing around with my friends' LCDs (Aquos). I loved the Sharp Aquos too but the Samung just had a bit of extra appeal... and it sold for a bit less than the Aquos.  It also looks better and the swivel stand is, I think, beter.Amazon's delivery was excellent, the delivery man took the TV out of the box, inspected it, and set it up for me.  The color presets work great for me and I haven't had to do much in the way of adjustment.  I am starting to play with the settings a bit more now, and explore the features, and so far, so good, though the one silly thing is, I cannot figure out what the back panel thing is for, and the plug is too short! But my Wii is happy....

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 in LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Willard Krohn
Reviews.Content: Have thus far been very pleased with the Samsung 40 in LCD TV. My Sony 42 in projection TV went black after five years and the cost of repairs to replace a thing called a "white engine" exceded the total cost of the of the new Samsung. Delivery was speedy and setup was easy requiring an additional cable (purchased at Radio Shack). My sattelite plan does not include High Definition but those shows broadcast in HD and converted to digital have almost the same quality on my new Samsung saving me a considerable sum on my monthly bill.

Reviews.Title: worth the wait
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Ross Sr. "TJR Harley"
Reviews.Content: I have searched like many of you and also waited for the prices to drop. The 550 42 inch Samsung HDTV is the best that I have seen for the money. It is a clear, trouble free tv. Although i have only had it for 6 weeks I have enjoyed evry minute. I strongly recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Purchased it as a gift
Reviews.Author: Alexis Guevara "Business Trip"
Reviews.Content: It was for my Brother, I wanted something that inexpensive and cool.  I don't know what to say, the quality is amazing, and he did not start using HDMI until a month ago.  All I have to say for that price, you can't go wrong, and its dropping.  a year ago it was $1,049.98 with free shipping.  You can't go wrong with this you just can't.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Deborah E. Tyler
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for my daughter's new apartment. She is totallyhappy and with an amazing picture, I am also satisfied. The deliveryperson was very friendly and professional.

Reviews.Title: Love Samsung products
Reviews.Author: Elaine K. Dawson
Reviews.Content: Bought the Samsung 46" last year and when I was looking for a new LCD for the bedroom, did not hesitate to order this one.  Picture quality is great (and we have a lousy cable company), All in all, a good choice.  My only complaint is with Amazon.  A week after I received the unit, they lowered the price another $40!

Reviews.Title: great TV, a must-buy
Reviews.Author: S. AYIVI "compulse me"
Reviews.Content: I have own this tv for 4 months now and i can say that it is my best buy on amazon ever. i haven't had any single problem with it yet and love everything about it!I would like to say something about the price since it seems like our review are based on a product performance and the amount of money we spend to get that performance. Had i spent $200 more on this TV, maybe i would have expected a lot more from it : maybe for a better sound for example but for the price i bought it ($850 or a little less) i think i feel comfortable able investing in a home theater to get the most out of the HD experience!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550
Reviews.Author: John H. Hillman
Reviews.Content: The product is more than I ever expected.  I'm using it in a second home and only have a small Digital/HD antenna.  The picture quality is exceptional.  Can't wait to have satellite input to expand it's capabilities.  The HD by airwave is unbelievable.  No doubt the best TV I've ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price!
Reviews.Author: bzgrl1
Reviews.Content: Just before Christmas, our 6 year old Panasonic projection was dying a horrible death, so the hubby and I decided to start looking for its replacement.  We had been to several electronics stores, checking online, comparing pictures and prices of many sets.  We decided on a Samsung 40 inch, but the prices were out of our range.  We kept looking and kept waiting.  Finally, I found this model at a price we could afford and jumped on it ([...]).Once it arrived (love the free shipping through Pilot!) I was able to hook it up within a matter of minutes while hubby was at work, and my son and I were watching television.  WOW!  The colors are bright and no matter where you sit in my living room, you can see the screen clearly, unlike our old projection.  I agree with other reviewers about the sound quality being lackluster, so we will be purchasing a surround sound system in the near future.Overall, I highly recommend the Samsung brand and, in particular, this television to anyone looking to purchase an LCD HDTV.  I am so glad we purchased this great TV, and we are planning on enjoying it for a long time!

Reviews.Title: TV works Great, Shipping was the worst experince I've ever had
Reviews.Author: Walter A. Salis
Reviews.Content: The only reason there are 2 stars removed from my review is the Nightmare on the shipping end of this transaction.  After purchasing this item I recieved a confirmation email and one that said the estimated delivery date was a week later which was fine, then that weekend I checked the tracking of my purchase with the link provided in the confirmation email , the link had shown that it was attempted to be delivered to my house the day before( at a time when I was home and there was no attempt).  After phone call after phone call and being told it will be delivered tomorrow over and over it finally showed up 4 days after the estimated date.  Other than that the TV works great , sound is good quality w/ even just the TV speakers that are on the bottom edge of the TV ( we mounted ours on the wall so speaker "muffle" is a non issue).

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Alex
Reviews.Content: I waited for a good deal on this and picked it up 2 weeks ago for $760. Can't beat the price and the TV is great. Delivery was faultless too.

Reviews.Title: ln40a550
Reviews.Author: Vernon A. Robinson
Reviews.Content: simply amazingPS3 looks goodwatching TV looks goodwith that being said this LCD comes highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: G. Blough "TheJediRevan"
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic.  Samsung is the way to go if you go for LCD.  WarehouseDeals had an amazing price and since it's through Amazon you know it's reliable.  The delivery was fast and thorough.  Just a pleasure overall!

Reviews.Title: Why pay more??
Reviews.Author: A. Santana
Reviews.Content: Just recieved my first lcd 52inch big screen. Ive spent two days tweeking and playing with it .This samsung is AMAZING. I got the bug from watching my sons sony xbr 52inch.The picture is just as good ,theres no blurring and sound is ok when eq is done to taste. At 60 hz its all goodTheres no need to spend more and REALLY get no more.With my surround sound Im in video heaven.Whats really strange is my son concurs!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung sings
Reviews.Author: Jerry Feezel
Reviews.Content: This was my entry into the flat screen era and I could not be happier. The newer LCD technology is great, a major improvement. Once we got a cable tech that knew how to hook up our new digital modem, we were sailing away.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Ian Jennings
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this, our first venture in to wide screen T.V's. Thanks to message boards like these, we chose this model and have no regrets. We found it very easy to set up. It's a simple process to change the screen profile depending on the type of program, movie you are watching.We are in a condo, so in fairnes to the neighbors, we won't be investing in a expensive sound system. We wish we could attach a simple speaker system like we do to our computer, but apparently, this is not possible without purchasing some sort of sound system box(lack of tech knowledge on this, sorry folks).Warning: If you use Time Warner Cable, be careful and check your cable box accepts the HDMI cable. Ours is an Explorer 4250, and intermently, only records sound, not the picture. Forums we checked confirmed this problem but Time Warner claim to know nothing about this. So check forums first. See this link [...]A great T.V though, we're pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great flat screen
Reviews.Author: Andrea Ildiko Szilagyi "Ildi"
Reviews.Content: I have looked at several LCD flat screens and I almost bought a Sony, but I am very glad I bought a 40" Samsung, the color ratio is higher than Sony's and the image is clearer, very sharp. I think this TV will last for a long, long time.The reason I purchased this TV is because my Panasonic tube TV which was only 9 years old when dead on me I could not believe it.Thank you Samsung, I know you make great cell phones so obviously you make great TVs. I am planning on buying a 32" LCD for my eleven year old and a "50 plus inch for my living room all Samsung.Thanks Amazon.com you guys rock great product and very prompt delivery love this site, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550 TV
Reviews.Author: Ken Ballou "golfnut"
Reviews.Content: Product worked right out of the box.  Not fully up to speed on all the bells and whistles but what I use with the DirectTV receiver works well.  The manual is some help but doesn't go far enough on how to hook up to DVR equipment; compatibility between DirectTV and DVR looks like a problem?

Reviews.Title: fast
Reviews.Author: rblaw
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture. The set arrived 3 days after I ordered. The delivery people insisted on setting it up. They even agreed to take away all the packing materials.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: James R. Harvey
Reviews.Content: If you want a great tv for a great price, buy this TV now.  I have basic cable and mostly use this TV for Blu-ray movies.  But, when I plugged it in and did an auto channel search, my basic cable picked up HD channels... weird, still trying to figure out how.  Anyway just buy the TV you'll love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Deking
Reviews.Content: I received the product in less time than I was originally told, and that was a pleasant surprise. Installation was easy and straight forward and the TV is everything I expected. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: homeowner
Reviews.Content: We are thrilled with this product.  The picture is so sharp and clear.  Samsung is super!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40A550 40-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Rocha
Reviews.Content: I have been enjoying it for a month. The shipping always worry me somehow. I guess because it gives you a better feeling picking up at the local store. However, it worked out very well.

Reviews.Title: A fantastic budget HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mac Waran
Reviews.Content: I shopped for brand + economic + quality HDTV, I came with Samsung LN40A550. I tried one of the Toshiba 37" LCDs from Costco, but had to return due to some strange issue with its firmware. I agree with most of the reviewer's +ve comments on this model. I don't see any -ve as I didn't face any issues yet.Let downs:1) PIP is not a selling point. This works only for standard resolution, not HD. So, it's simply not usable.2) Cannot permanently delete a channel, the kids are smart enough to add the channel back from the master list.3) Cannot block specific channels, can only block based on program ratings. I actually want to block the kids programs, and open only for the weekends. Not possible with this, a severe let down.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth the money
Reviews.Author: R. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before buying this TV and can honestly say I'm very happy with the purchase.  Given other reviews I was a bit worried about the sound quality, but the sound is excellent through the TV speakers alone.  Everything else: picture quality, menu functions and setup, remote, etc. are superb.  And Amazon's price beat every other on-line quote.

Reviews.Title: Samsung "slightly damaged" 42" TV
Reviews.Author: Warren G. Aaronson
Reviews.Content: This was advertised as either used or slightly damaged.  The advertising did not say that it was last year's model.That being said, the set arrived in PERFECT condition; it was brand new and not at all damaged.  A 42" flat screen Tv for about $900 was a fantastic value.  I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great item - great price - great service!
Reviews.Author: Yuteva
Reviews.Content: I asked a trusted friend to suggest which HDTV I should buy and I could not be happier.  I can't imagine a better product and could not ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Blea
Reviews.Content: This TV is great.  Great color and resolution.  Looks great when run on a line conditioner.  Really intensifies the color and adds a lot of clarity.  PS Audio Quintet is what I have and highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Service and TV!
Reviews.Author: Bryan P. Kline "Bryan Kline"
Reviews.Content: I just ordered this tv from amazon on Sunday July 20th after reading the reviews and seeing how great the price was for this tv. Amazon had an estimated arrival date of July 30th but I checked with CEVA this morning and they had already recieved it. CEVA told me that it would be delivered between 11-3 today and it arrived at 11:30 in perfect condition. Talk about great service! Only took two days to get this great tv! Thank you Amazon and thank you CEVA.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD for the money
Reviews.Author: Bud "Budster"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in perfect condition.  We had it mounted on the wall and have really enjoyed the quality of the picture and sound.  Lots of options available in those areas.  We already had a Samsung VCR/DVD player/recorder and it works great with the TV remote.

Reviews.Title: Happy, but not sure about lcd and Hd is it really worth it?
Reviews.Author: Nicholsa Johns
Reviews.Content: Well I have owned this Tv for about a week now. Amazon delivered on time even early,and set up my tv turned it on and had a check list for me to go through that made sure sound and picture worked. Great job Ceva and Amazon will use it agin. I'm 24 so this is my first big tv buy. I have my old Panasonic 37" Tv set up next to my new Samsung 40" lcd, and yes the color is better but there is this blurr around people's face on the new lcd tv, even on hd channels, but on my old tube tv clear as day. Note i dont have an hd box yet, but some local channels come in Hd and are free, and yes i do have the hdmi hooked up and still  there is a blurr when I am close to my tv like 3 feet away. So I really dont know if all this new lcd and 120hz and all that is really worth it. I do have my xbox 360 hooked up and it does seem to be very clear, but it lags at time i swear with this new tv.  I will get an hd box and see if i works better and i hope it does.Oh and one more thing if you have surround sound and your reciver has a digital audio hook up pick up the cable for it. Your sound will be 100% better. I hope this helped.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: UF Gators
Reviews.Content: Spent a good deal of time looking for a 37 to 42 inch 1080p LCD tv within my price range and felt that for the money this offered much more than comparable Sony or Sharp sets.  Only disappointment I experienced with the TV was its limited support of HDMI-CEC features which I was under the impression it supported.  Lastly, if price is not an object, spend the extra money for a 120 hz version of this TV its going to have much better picture.  All in all though, this TV is great, fantastic picture and plenty of inputs make it a great option for buyers with blu-ray players and other AV equipment.

Reviews.Title: When the Price is Right...
Reviews.Author: C. Fern "cuban chris"
Reviews.Content: At the point I'm writing this, just about all of these reviews are overwhelmingly positive.  And that is for good reason!  I bought and received this TV a good 3 weeks ago now and treat it like a newborn son.  I'm always boasting its a 'Samsung' and its 'full HD' and it only cost '1170' haha.  I should really stop.What I'm getting at is how really slick this TV is.  It's picture is crystal clear, deep and saturated to perfection. Its worth noting that like most everyone else I shopped around at the big box stores and came away impressed by the Samsung quality.  But an interesting little side note is I had the TV delivered to my parent's house and my father had just bought a Samsung 4065 in the Fall... I ran them next to each other and the 30,000:1 contrast and improved (10m -> 5m) response time is a huge difference!Bottom line: The picture is excellent, the sound is plenty fine (for now), and the price was right.  If you're riddled with anxiety, looking for the right HDTV, look no further.Also - the delivery was excellent - got it a week before schedule and the delivery man was extremely nice.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT ORDER FROM 3RD PARTY VENDOR
Reviews.Author: Roger "Roger"
Reviews.Content: I've ordered from amazon.com for about 3 years. I am a prime member. I ordered this TV because of the other users ratings on this web site. This TV has pixilation problems. When there is fast motion, you can see the pixels for a brief period less than 1 second. I have a plasma TV with the same Fios connection with no such problems. If you are not a videophile this will not bother your. If you however pay attention to it like I do, this will drive you nuts. I tried to return the product to 6th avenue electronics (3rd party vendor), and they will not take it back because TV is larger than 37 inches. They claim this was in the fine print when I ordered. Their rep. told me all LCD's pixelate with fast motion! Come on, I thought this technology had improved. I don't care about it being bright, next time I'm going back to plasma. Amazon.com rep. was from overseas and was useless. I'm done with ordering electronics through amazon. I'm very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Buy something else
Reviews.Author: Dennis J. Ferry "DenDen"
Reviews.Content: Please consider another brand of lcd.  The sound on this set is inferior to almost all other sets on the market.  The set stopped working completely one and a half months after the 1 year warrenty.  I made a mistake and wish you do not.  Sincerely.....Dennis
